['Essential Duties and Responsibilities', 'Designs data experiments and methodologies to generate and collect data for business use.', '\xa0At this leading global grill manufacturing and marketing company you will have the opportunity to work with massive datasets to drive revenue growth, improve our operational processes,\xa0and affect the shopping and grilling experience for our consumers worldwide.', 'This position is responsible for planning, managing and executing an array and analytics activities to provide insights and model results that benefit the consumer marketing and product development teams.\xa0This involves, in part, collecting data and constructing solutions to business problems.Performs\xa0complex statistical analysis on sample and real-world business datasets to validate and quantify trends or patterns of interest to the business groups worldwide.Constructs both explanatory and predictive models to support data analysis or product functions; verifies model effectiveness based on real-world results.Designs data experiments and methodologies to generate and collect data for business use.Conducts some data engineering activities on the Google Cloud Platform, including developing ETL processes, scheduling ETL jobs and modifying existing Python code and Google BigQuery scripts, as necessary to update ETL jobs.', 'Performs\xa0complex statistical analysis on sample and real-world business datasets to validate and quantify trends or patterns of interest to the business groups worldwide.', 'Constructs both explanatory and predictive models to support data analysis or product functions; verifies model effectiveness based on real-world results.', 'Education and or Experience', '\xa0', 'An ideal candidate would be someone who has a track record of successfully delivering analytical projects, is passionate about working with data to find the story hidden within, demonstrates a continuous learning and growth mindset, has experience working at the intersection\xa0of consumer marketing and technology, and has an ability to communicate complex analytics concepts in non-technical terms to business leaders.', 'This position is responsible for planning, managing and executing an array and analytics activities to provide insights and model results that benefit the consumer marketing and product development teams.\xa0This involves, in part, collecting data and constructing solutions to business problems.', 'Conducts some data engineering activities on the Google Cloud Platform, including developing ETL processes, scheduling ETL jobs and modifying existing Python code and Google BigQuery scripts, as necessary to update ETL jobs.', 'Summary', "Bachelor's degree or advanced degree in statistics, marketing analytics, computer science, information science or other quantitative field and 3 or more years of work experience in consumer analytics, with clear examples of work performed in predictive modeling.", 'Weber is looking for a Data Scientist to join our Strategic Data Analytics team. Data scientists work on our centralized enterprise analytics team to develop predictive models using machine learning, data visualization,\xa0and other forms of advanced analytics.\xa0The data science effort is growing at Weber, and we are looking for a new team member interested in learning and collaborating to help solve consumer marketing and other business problems with data-driven solutions.']

company: UCAR - The University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
job_text: ['', 'Whatever your intersection of identities, you are welcome at the University Corporation for Atmospheric Research (UCAR). We are committed to inclusivity and promoting an equitable environment that values and respects the uniqueness of all members of our organization.', 'Where You Will Work', 'Participates and or leads the JCSDA activities in constituent assimilation, including pioneering new approaches to meet the needs of the JCSDA partners and diverse users (aerosols, reactive chemical species, long-lived greenhouse gases).', 'Highly collaborative, organized, and detail-oriented. Ability to be a productive member of a research team with good interpersonal skills', 'Location: In light of the ongoing coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic and restricted access to UCAR facilities, UCAR may allow temporary remote work arrangements for newly hired employees. Eventual relocation to onsite is required for this specific position. This position will be located in the GMAO at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center in Greenbelt, MD or in Boulder, CO. ', 'This position is subject to work location requirements for obtaining access to facilities and research systems. These requirements may include a combination of national security checks, credit checks, fingerprinting, or other security clearance requirements. Applicants must be able to obtain unescorted physical access to NASA facilities and obtain computational accounts on NASA’s HPC resources. An Inclusion Statement will be required for all applicants advancing to an in-person interview. If requested, this statement should address past efforts, as well as future vision and plans to advocate for and advance diversity, equity, and inclusion in the organization and/or field of work.  Please note - Research Scientist will only be moved into a Project Scientist III position through a committee review process.  A pre-employment screening is conducted in conjunction with an offer for employment. This screening may involve verifying or reviewing any of the following relevant information: restricted parties screening, employment verification, performance records of internal candidates, education verification, reference checks, verification of professional licenses, certifications, and Motor Vehicle Records. UCAR complies with the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA). ', 'This position is subject to work location requirements for obtaining access to facilities and research systems. These requirements may include a combination of national security checks, credit checks, fingerprinting, or other security clearance requirements. Applicants must be able to obtain unescorted physical access to NASA facilities and obtain computational accounts on NASA’s HPC resources.', 'What You Need:', 'Build data assimilation capability for atmospheric constituents in the JCSDA data assimilation systems, including emissions uncertainty, inter-constituent correlations, and observational uncertainty, as well as other necessary procedures for data assimilation.', 'For Project Scientist II', 'Regularly serves as a Co-Principal Investigator.', ' Expert knowledge of atmospheric composition (aerosols and/or gaseous species), emissions processes, and constituent data assimilation. ', ' An Inclusion Statement will be required for all applicants advancing to an in-person interview. If requested, this statement should address past efforts, as well as future vision and plans to advocate for and advance diversity, equity, and inclusion in the organization and/or field of work. ', 'What You Will Do', 'Strong skills in programming (Fortran 90+, C++, etc) and scripting (e.g., Python). ', 'Desired Knowledge, Skills, Abilities', 'Responsibilities', 'Build data assimilation capability for atmospheric constituents in the JCSDA data assimilation systems, including emissions uncertainty, inter-constituent correlations, and observational uncertainty, as well as other necessary procedures for data assimilation.Participates and or leads the JCSDA activities in constituent assimilation, including pioneering new approaches to meet the needs of the JCSDA partners and diverse users (aerosols, reactive chemical species, long-lived greenhouse gases).Conduct independent research to optimize the use of NASA and other constituent observations in data assimilation and to devise comprehensive testing systems and evaluation metrics to assess the quality of results.Contributes to project reports. Regular authorship of scientific/resource publications; presentation of results at national or international scientific conferences is expected.Other miscellaneous activities.', 'Advanced knowledge of atmospheric composition (aerosols and/or gaseous species), emissions processes, and constituent data assimilation. ', ' Please note - Research Scientist will only be moved into a Project Scientist III position through a committee review process. ', ' Ph.D. in a relevant science, and at least ten years of experience in the scientific field of specialization; or an equivalent combination of education and experience. ', 'Applicants should have expertise in data assimilation. Experience of hyperspectral radiance data is desirable but not required. Knowledge and experience of the Community Radiative Transfer Model (CRTM) or similar radiative transfer models are preferred. Technical skills include proficiency in programming on high-performance computers and familiarity with operational-quality data systems.', 'Knowledge and experience of satellite radiance data assimilation and associated working areas (e.g., QC, bias correction, thinning, etc). Familiar with data assimilation system(s) (e.g., GSI, WRFDA, JEDI, etc) ', 'Advanced knowledge of atmospheric composition (aerosols and/or gaseous species), emissions processes, and constituent data assimilation. Thorough knowledge and experience of constituent remote sensing and of atmospheric composition modeling. Strong skills in programming (Fortran 90+, C++, etc) and scripting (e.g., Python). Ability to work as a part of a larger group using a modern code management framework (Git, Continuous Integration / Agile programming methods, test-driven development, extreme programming, etc.)Highly collaborative, organized, and detail-oriented. Ability to be a productive member of a research team with good interpersonal skillsRegularly serves as a Co-Principal Investigator.Excellent oral and written communication skills with an emphasis in technical communication and the ability to write proposals.May author scientific reports and referred publications and give presentations at scientific meetings.', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills with an emphasis in technical communication and the ability to write proposals.', ' Regularly serves as a Principal Investigator or Co-Principal Investigator. ', 'The University Corporation for Atmospheric Research (UCAR) is an equal opportunity/equal access/affirmative action employer that strives to develop and maintain a diverse workforce. UCAR is committed to providing equal opportunity for all employees and applicants for employment and does not discriminate on the basis of race, age, creed, color, religion, national origin or ancestry, sex, gender, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or pregnancy. ', 'Contributes to project reports. Regular authorship of scientific/resource publications; presentation of results at national or international scientific conferences is expected.', ' Often develops proposals and negotiates with funding agencies. ', 'May author scientific reports and referred publications and give presentations at scientific meetings.', 'For Project Scientist III (Research Scientist)', 'Conduct independent research to optimize the use of NASA and other constituent observations in data assimilation and to devise comprehensive testing systems and evaluation metrics to assess the quality of results.', ' Authors scientific reports and refereed publications and gives presentations at scientific meetings. ', 'Applicant Notes:', 'Ability to work as a part of a larger group using a modern code management framework (Git, Continuous Integration / Agile programming methods, test-driven development, extreme programming, etc.)', ' Expert knowledge of atmospheric composition (aerosols and/or gaseous species), emissions processes, and constituent data assimilation.  Regularly serves as a Principal Investigator or Co-Principal Investigator.  Often develops proposals and negotiates with funding agencies.  Authors scientific reports and refereed publications and gives presentations at scientific meetings. ', 'Other miscellaneous activities.', ' A pre-employment screening is conducted in conjunction with an offer for employment. This screening may involve verifying or reviewing any of the following relevant information: restricted parties screening, employment verification, performance records of internal candidates, education verification, reference checks, verification of professional licenses, certifications, and Motor Vehicle Records. UCAR complies with the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA). ', ' Ph.D. in a relevant science, and at least three years of experience in the scientific field of specialization; or an equivalent combination of education and experience. ', 'Thorough knowledge and experience of constituent remote sensing and of atmospheric composition modeling. ']

In particular, assessment of tumor growth and immune cell infiltration following immune modulating therapies, such as adoptive T cell or immune checkpoint blockade therapy. In particular, assessment of tumor growth and immune cell infiltration following immune modulating therapies, such as adoptive T cell or immune checkpoint blockade therapy.', ' Plan and supervise the training of technicians and other laboratory personnel with respect to proper laboratory techniques, the use of laboratory equipment, and safety procedures.', 'Specific Laboratory Skills And Knowledge Competencies', ' Maintain good working relationship with other researchers and technicians Train and supervise investigators and other laboratory personnel in proper laboratory techniques, the use of laboratory equipment, and safety procedures Explain to staff members the scientific protocols currently being employed in the laboratory', 'Work Closely With Other Staff Members', 'Research Scientist', ' Train and supervise investigators and other laboratory personnel in proper laboratory techniques, the use of laboratory equipment, and safety procedures', ' Maintain alertness and careful attention to avoid injury to self and others in the laboratory.', ' Basic laboratory skills including, but not limited to, qPCR, ELISA, western blotting', ' Maintain assertiveness and flexibility in approaching new techniques and responsibilities, utilizing good work habits and time management.', ' Monitor and anticipate laboratory needs in terms of equipment and supplies.', ' Explain to staff members the scientific protocols currently being employed in the laboratory', ' Supervises laboratory personnel safety procedures according to MDACC and Environmental Health and Safety procedures. Plan and supervise the training of technicians and other laboratory personnel with respect to proper laboratory techniques, the use of laboratory equipment, and safety procedures. Maintain alertness and careful attention to avoid injury to self and others in the laboratory.', ' Supervise and support other laboratory personnel as they execute experiments', ' Under the supervision of the Principal Investigator, develop and design projects and all experiments related to the projects. Independently and/or together with other lab members or internal/external collaborators perform all aspects of the experiments Supervise and support other laboratory personnel as they execute experiments Maintain an up-to-date, organized, and legible laboratory journal that records all experiments in detail and ensure that subordinates do the same. Designs, organizes and performs animal work and protocols Participate in adopting new techniques and learning new skills to enhance research Maintain assertiveness and flexibility in approaching new techniques and responsibilities, utilizing good work habits and time management. Monitor and anticipate laboratory needs in terms of equipment and supplies. Prepare oral and written reports about the progress of various projects. Review the scientific literature regularly to plan the research projects Compile, write, and submit project results to Principal Investigator. Prepare, write, and edit scientific documents (manuscripts, posters, abstracts, etc) for publication or for funding purposes. Present findings of research projects to professional groups. Store data on approved, MD Anderson network drives.']

job_title: Global Safety Surveillance and Analysis Data Analyst
job_text: ['', 'we', 'Qualifications', 'Collaborating with multi-functional teams to develop innovative and effective approaches to address post-market safety issues.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science, Business Analytics, Statistics, Biostatistics, Math, or other quantitative discipline.', 'Whatweoffer:', 'Good organizational skills with strong attention to detail.', 'Requirements (skills / experiences) for the role:', 'Evaluating post-market safety data as well as other relevant data sets and proposing algorithmic solutions to extract business value: algorithms include but are not limited to natural language processing, structured and unstructured data (text) classification, and machine/deep learning.', ' Evaluating post-market safety data as well as other relevant data sets and proposing algorithmic solutions to extract business value: algorithms include but are not limited to natural language processing, structured and unstructured data (text) classification, and machine/deep learning. Developing tools with statistical and/or artificial intelligence models to automate established routine work processes or analyses. Continuously improving current data mining methodology, tools, and systems. Collaborating with multi-functional teams to develop innovative and effective approaches to address post-market safety issues. ', 'Proficient in R and at least one other data modelling/analysis language, such as Python -Ability to explore and manipulate structured and unstructured data at moderate/large scale.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science, Business Analytics, Statistics, Biostatistics, Math, or other quantitative discipline.Proficient in R and at least one other data modelling/analysis language, such as Python -Ability to explore and manipulate structured and unstructured data at moderate/large scale.Experience with analytical tools, including manipulation and visualization of data using reporting tools. Statistical analysis experience or clinically oriented informatics research is a plus but not required. Experience with Tableau, Microsoft BI tools, and/or Alteryx is a plus.Experience in data analytics: extracting/summarizing data and reporting results with strong understanding of data models, relationships and sound analytical principles.Strong written and verbal communication in English with ability to communicate technical topics to non-analyst colleagues. Experience communicating human health, safety, and clinical information is a plus.Ability to work in complex systems.Good collaboration skills, able to establish and maintain strong working relationships.Good organizational skills with strong attention to detail.', 'offer:', 'What', 'Continuously improving current data mining methodology, tools, and systems.', 'Experience with analytical tools, including manipulation and visualization of data using reporting tools. Statistical analysis experience or clinically oriented informatics research is a plus but not required. Experience with Tableau, Microsoft BI tools, and/or Alteryx is a plus.', 'Experience in data analytics: extracting/summarizing data and reporting results with strong understanding of data models, relationships and sound analytical principles.', 'Description', 'Ability to work in complex systems.', 'About Us', 'Developing tools with statistical and/or artificial intelligence models to automate established routine work processes or analyses.', 'Good collaboration skills, able to establish and maintain strong working relationships.', 'Strong written and verbal communication in English with ability to communicate technical topics to non-analyst colleagues. Experience communicating human health, safety, and clinical information is a plus.']

['', '• have formed meaningful relationships across squads and disciplines in the organization through deep collaboration within your product team, with stakeholders, marketing, analytics, online merchandising, IT and other business partners', '• have conducted several complete research initiatives that have effectively informed strategic direction on future and current transformation efforts such as concept testing, user testing, competitive analysis, persona building, task analysis, user story creation and user experience mapping', '• are deeply passionate about the user and their experiences', 'Essential functions:', '• understanding of digital accessibility', '• have started to establish yourself as the go-to person on the team for all things related to user research, user behaviors, best practices in conducting the right research methods to gain the most insightful user data', 'We are looking for a UX Researcher to help us take our ecommerce platform to the future and beyond. We are looking for a passionate researcher and team player who will be part of a massive digital transformation effort. The UX Researcher will be responsible for uncovering any and all unmet and unstated needs of our users and establishing and maintaining a constant, growing and evolving customer feedback loop.', '• don’t mind travelling about 50% of your time to get to know your users', 'Bonus points for:', '• have a background in ethnography and/or cognitive science methods (ideal)', '• have participated design reviews with your teams to provide relevant feedback', 'You:', '• translate research data gathered into actionable recommendations that help inform future efforts and can deliver recommendations to business partners and leaders in a consumable and delightful manner', '• conduct or support secondary research efforts including analytics, user recordings and feedback, survey results, customer service call logs, internal usage reports, and others', '• validate concepts and prototypes to uncover additional insights and opportunities', '• partner with a digital product team working with UX, UI, product, customer support, technology and other internal business partners', '• be collaborating with strategic VOC partners and corporate customer insights team on strategic direction to best measure customer sentiment', '• have participated in several design sessions to help inform squads of the needs of the user', '• enjoy sharing your knowledge with all, as applicable', 'Reports to: Senior Manager, UX Research', '• have an understanding of human centric design principles and are passionate about user experiences', '• can demonstrate having conducted and/or utilized moderated and unmoderated testing methods and tools to gain insights from users', 'On day one you will know how to:', '• skills with evangelizing human centric design methodologies and the purpose of each', '• are familiar with and have used a variety of unmoderated online research tools but are just as comfortable in a moderated setting', '• have informed A/B and multi-variate testing, surveys, interviews and other user studies based on research conducted or provided', '• are a professional with 3-5 years of experience conducting, analyzing and communicating user research findings and insights', '• have extended expertise in understanding the right methodologies for uncovering user needs and product opportunities', '• conduct or support primary user research studies with business stakeholders and users to gain user insights around met, unmet, stated and unstated needs', 'The UX Researcher will help uncover and define user needs, analyze data gather through various research methods and analytics and validate whether or not digital transformation efforts are meeting the needs of our users. The UX Researcher will work directly with the entire product team across multiple squads to prioritize and specify features to deliver great new experiences.', '• have worked in virtual teams', '• love learning new things and challenging yourself', '• embrace change', '• have created and presented your work in multiple formats, in particular slide format (think Powerpoint primarily) to upper management, stakeholders and other business partners in a consumable and enjoyable manner', 'A year from now you will:', '• have visited with many of our customers across all the classes of trade', '• identify the proper research methods needed to best meet the needs of the goals of the problems we are trying to understand', '• have worked in an agile or iterative work setting and enjoy co-locating with your entire team', '• define user research methods that most effectively inform strategic direction on future and current transformation efforts', '• UX, UI or writing capability and portfolio to showcase', '• design-thinking badge or coaching certification', '• be the go-to person on your team for all things related to user research, user behaviors, best practices conducting the right research to gain the right insights for your projects', '• have a bachelors or higher degree in HCI, UX research, cognitive science or other relevant human disciplines', 'After 90 days you will:', '• have learned enough about our complex business and systems to be able to articulate what you do and why it matters', '• PhD in a behavioral discipline', '• have built/or supported the build of a database of user behaviors, triggers and other data points that can be easily extracted to support design decisions', '• have (or have started to) aggregate, analyze, share and communicate findings and insights to inform recommendations on the best digital experiences our customers want and need']

['• Strong understanding of RNA-seq, DNA-seq and single cell NGS technologies, with a track record of developing genomics-based NGS technologies', '• Experience with assays such as targeted sequencing, multiplex PCR, ddPCR', '• Proficiency with MS Office suite, and ability to analyze and present genomic data', '• Develop and edit protocols and standard operating procedures', '• Competence with standard cell isolation, cell culture, compound treatment, FF and FFPE tissue handling', '• Perform a wide variety of basic molecular biology techniques with minimal supervision', 'Client : Biopharmaceutical company', '• PhD degree with training and direct experience in molecular biology and cutting-edge genomics assay development', '• Deep understanding of Illumina sequencing data and ability to interpret secondary data analysis metrics', '• Commit to quality by rigorous and constant evaluation of own work', '• Implementation of single cell RNA-seq and CRISPR-based Perturb-seq assays using the 10x Genomics platform', '• Proficiency with spatial NGS tissue profiling and CRISPR genomics technologies', '• Strong organizational skills and comfort with systems e.g., Confluence, JIRA, SharePoint systems', 'Responsibilities', '• Execution of spatial NGS tissue profiling, employing platforms such as 10x Genomics Visium', '• Experience with standard molecular biology tools e.g., PCR, qPCR, FACS', '• Ability to use technical skills and good time management to perform work efficiently and meet project timelines', '\xa0Location:\xa0San Diego, CA 92121', 'About Client\xa0', 'Duration: 12 Months\xa0Contract', 'Client is a global biopharmaceutical company whose mission is to discover, develop and deliver innovative medicines that help patients prevail over serious diseases. ', '\xa0', '• Work independently and/or in collaboration with other team members on new assay and protocol development', 'Job Title:\xa0Research Scientist\xa0', 'Description:\xa0', '• Development and benchmarking of high-throughput RNA-seq assays', '• Perform routine cell culture and compound treatment of cells, along with functional assays related to drug response in cell lines', 'The advertised position provides an exciting opportunity to be a member of a highly innovative and collaborative NGS technology development team, in Sequencing Research Group, San Diego. As part of the larger Informatics and Predictive Sciences organization at client, the candidate will play a pivotal role in developing novel genomics assays and platforms, to drive impactful diverse drug discovery programs. The candidate will be in the unique position to engage with diverse scientific teams, utilizing enabling genomics tool to solve complex biological questions, with line of sight to benefit patient health. The ideal candidate should have a PhD degree with at least 2 years of direct experience in NGS assay development. The position is for employment on a contract basis for 1 year, with potential to extend or convert.', 'Description', 'Skills/Knowledge preferred', '• Demonstrates adaptability; able to function effectively in a fast paced and rapidly changing environment', 'One shared journey is moving us forward at client. ['', 'Master’s degree in Pharmacy, Public Health, Healthcare Economics or related clinical discipline', 'Conducts and coordinates customer meetings to communicate study progress and results', 'Writes proposals, protocols, statistical analysis plans', 'Completes regulatory and compliance documents', 'PharmD or Ph.D. preferred\xa0', 'Writes proposals, protocols, statistical analysis plansWorks with study sponsors to identify and refine study conceptsEstablishes effective timelines for completion of milestones and delivery of studiesCompletes regulatory and compliance documentsDesigns data requirements for studies based on feasibility estimates and available dataWorks with data from multiple sources (including electronic health records and claims)Researches and performs critical and statistical analysis of medical and scientific evidence as the basis for evaluation of cancer therapiesConducts and coordinates customer meetings to communicate study progress and resultsAnalyzes data to answer questions posed by internal and external stakeholdersFormats output of data analysis for customer readiness, including writing final reports and preparing presentationsPublishes research results as abstracts, posters, manuscriptsSolid oral and written communication skills. Position will require customer interaction either by phone or in person.', 'Analyzes data to answer questions posed by internal and external stakeholders', 'Outcomes research and pharmacoeconomic training', 'Healthcare experience and knowledge of Real World data sources required; Oncology and Pharmaceutical/CRO experience strongly preferred', 'Must be able to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams in a fast-paced matrix environment', 'McKesson believes superior performance – individual and team – that helps us drive innovations and solutions to promote better health should be recognized and rewarded. We provide a competitive compensation program to attract, retain and motivate a high-performance workforce, and it’s flexible enough to meet the different needs of our diverse employee population.', 'Solid oral and written communication skills. Position will require customer interaction either by phone or in person.', 'Position Summary', 'This position reports into Manager, Clinical Programs and designs, analyzes, and reports health outcomes, pharmacoeconomic, and disease management information from real-world evidence studies. Provides hematology/oncology research and clinical analysis expertise to pharmaceutical manufacturers, physician and organization leadership. Conducts comparative effectiveness, pharmacoeconomic and health outcomes research. Supports and adheres company Code of Ethics and Business Standards. Works independently and under the supervision of research managers and directors.', '3-5 years’ experience in writing and completing clinical research studies requiredMust have experience navigating EHR and claims dataOutcomes research and pharmacoeconomic trainingHealthcare experience and knowledge of Real World data sources required; Oncology and Pharmaceutical/CRO experience strongly preferredProven success managing multiple projects simultaneously with multiple timelines and varied deliverablesMust be able to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams in a fast-paced matrix environmentProficient with Microsoft Word, PowerPoint and Excel and Webex/Microsoft Teams', 'Proven success managing multiple projects simultaneously with multiple timelines and varied deliverables', 'Designs data requirements for studies based on feasibility estimates and available data', 'Must have experience navigating EHR and claims data', 'Equal Opportunity', 'Proficient with Microsoft Word, PowerPoint and Excel and Webex/Microsoft Teams', 'No agencies please', 'Publishes research results as abstracts, posters, manuscripts', 'Benefits & Company Statement', 'Be part of the team that’s poised to transform the fight against cancer. Backed by the strength of a Fortune 8 company, our entrepreneurial organization develops technologies used by the oncology community to deliver evidence-based, personalized care, as well as insights used by biopharma companies to accelerate drug development and support the entire treatment journey. Our work powers informed decision-making at every pivotal moment in oncology – from the treatment options presented to patients, to the operational considerations for oncology practices, to the design of clinical trials, to the commercial launch plans for new therapies.', '3-5 years’ experience in writing and completing clinical research studies required', 'Key Responsibilities', 'But we can’t do it without you. Every single McKesson employee contributes to our mission—whatever your title, whatever your role, you act as a catalyst in a chain of events that helps millions of people all over the globe. Talented, compassionate people are the future of our company—and of healthcare. At McKesson, you’ll collaborate on the products and solutions that help us carry out our mission to improve lives and advance healthcare. Working here is your opportunity to shape an industry that’s vital to us all.', 'Physical Requirements', 'Researches and performs critical and statistical analysis of medical and scientific evidence as the basis for evaluation of cancer therapies', 'Agency Statement', 'Establishes effective timelines for completion of milestones and delivery of studies', 'Works with study sponsors to identify and refine study concepts', 'Works with data from multiple sources (including electronic health records and claims)', 'Typically requires 7+ years of relevant research/clinical/healthcare experience', 'Typically requires 7+ years of relevant research/clinical/healthcare experienceMaster’s degree in Pharmacy, Public Health, Healthcare Economics or related clinical disciplinePharmD or Ph.D. preferred\xa0', 'Typical Minimum Requirements ', 'General Office Demands', 'We are in the business of better health and we touch the lives of patients in virtually every aspect of healthcare. We partner with payers, hospitals, physician offices, pharmacies, pharmaceutical companies and others across the spectrum of care to build healthier organizations that deliver better care to patients in every setting.', 'Qualified applicants will not be disqualified from consideration for employment based upon criminal history.', 'McKesson is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer – minorities/females/veterans/persons with disabilities.', 'Formats output of data analysis for customer readiness, including writing final reports and preparing presentations', 'Critical Skills ']

['', 'Work collaboratively with a product manager, engineering manager, business stakeholders, and other engineers in an Agile environmentDesign and implement dimensional data models that capture company-wide business processesAsk thoughtful questions and listen carefully to get to know your business partners’ vocabulary, problems, goals, and constraintsContribute to the technical leadership of the team through writing, technical guidance, planning, mentorship, and other efforts to help guide the team to success', 'A health-and-wellness stipend', 'Ask thoughtful questions and listen carefully to get to know your business partners’ vocabulary, problems, goals, and constraints', 'Contribute to the technical leadership of the team through writing, technical guidance, planning, mentorship, and other efforts to help guide the team to success', 'Work collaboratively with a product manager, engineering manager, business stakeholders, and other engineers in an Agile environment', 'Of course, all work and no play makes a dull workplace. Who likes that? At Warby Parker, you can look forward to company outings, volunteering and learning opportunities, and just great company. Teammates can also connect around common interests, backgrounds, and identities, no matter their home base, through our various employee resource groups. (We’re happy to say that the Human Rights Campaign has named us a Best Place to Work for LGBTQ+ employees!) That sense of community keeps us excited to walk through the door every day. Good work, good people.', 'Health, vision, and dental insurance', 'You are not on the Office of Inspector General’s List of Excluded Individuals/Entities (LEIE)', 'Top-notch communication skills—you’re an empathetic listener and a proactive communicator both in person and in writing', 'Health, vision, and dental insuranceFlexible “My Time” vacation policyRetirement savings plan with a company matchParental leave (non-birthing parents included)Cell phone plan reimbursementA health-and-wellness stipendFree eyewear, plus discounts for friends and familyAnd more—just ask!', 'Cell phone plan reimbursement', 'Warby Parker was founded with a lofty objective: to offer designer eyewear at a revolutionary price while leading the way for socially conscious businesses. By circumventing traditional channels and designing our frames in-house, we’re able to offer top-quality glasses and sunglasses (plus an uncommonly delightful shopping experience) at a fraction of the traditional going price.', 'Some benefits and perks of working at Warby Parker:', 'Retirement savings plan with a company match', 'The ability to learn and work comfortably with the tools of modern software engineering—whether that’s working at the command line, using version control, writing tests, or performing code reviews', "What's crucial for your success:", '\ufeffAbout us:', '3+ years of experience designing and deploying dimensional models', '\xa0', 'Free eyewear, plus discounts for friends and family', 'Since starting out in 2010, we’ve set up headquarters in New York City and Nashville, built our own optical lab, and opened retail locations all around the U.S. and Canada. As we grow, we’re committed to proving that businesses can scale and be profitable while doing good in the world. For every pair of glasses we sell, a pair is distributed to someone in need—to date, that’s over five million pairs.', '3+ years of experience designing and deploying dimensional modelsFluency in SQLThe ability to learn and work comfortably with the tools of modern software engineering—whether that’s working at the command line, using version control, writing tests, or performing code reviewsTop-notch communication skills—you’re an empathetic listener and a proactive communicator both in person and in writingYou are not on the Office of Inspector General’s List of Excluded Individuals/Entities (LEIE)', 'Fluency in SQL', 'Parental leave (non-birthing parents included)', 'At Warby Parker, we’re out to prove that businesses can scale, be profitable, and do good in the world—and we’re searching for a motivated Senior Data Engineer to help us on this mission! In this role, you’ll work collaboratively to develop and implement data models that act as the eyes and ears of a complex business that spans e-commerce, supply chain, marketing, retail, customer service, product development, and more. Your efforts to collect, organize, and share data will impact nearly all of Team Warby and will be highly visible across the organization. Sound like the job for you? Keep reading!', 'What you’ll do:', 'Flexible “My Time” vacation policy', 'And more—just ask!', 'Design and implement dimensional data models that capture company-wide business processes']

job_title: AI Research scientist: up to $350,000 base+equity
job_text: ['', 'We are looking for talented research scientists to be part of the founding team. You will help build the product that applies unsupervised learning to model the world and automatically creates and manages production grade AI systems. As an initial member of the founding team, you get to own a significant chunk of the company, shape its culture and work on state-of-the-art science and technology.', 'We are a stealth startup building a cutting-edge cloud AI service. Our founders have a wealth of experience working on various ground-breaking products including self driving cars, AWS AI services, GMail, Google Docs and flash storage systems. We have also previously been founders and early employees at startups. We are backed by Eric Schmidt and Decibel Ventures with Series A funding of $18 million.\xa0', 'Coming up with new techniques in unsupervised learning, dataset augmentation, and deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to automating various parts of the AI development workflow.', 'Job Description:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Candidates will need to have a PhD preferably in Artificial Intelligence or Machine Learning. We are looking for people who have done research and/or published papers in one of the following areas: Unsupervised Learning; Generative Modeling; Deep Neural Networks; Deep Reinforcement Learning; Generative Adversarial Networks; Causal Reasoning. Ideal candidates would be able to rapidly build on new ideas with engineers, potentially publish at top conferences, and be able to write code.', 'General Requirements:']

', 'Present findings and implications (from a single study or a combination of multiple studies and/or data sources) to the stakeholder audience.']

['', 'Come grow with us!', 'Work with the team to manage project task identification and milestone schedule.', 'This is a hands-on senior research position. FDH is seeking someone with many years of industry experience doing basic research that results in real-world nondestructive testing solutions.\xa0', 'Company Description', 'Review technical problem statements, perform comprehensive literature review throughout technical references, and validate applicability of different experimental and analytical methods for the desired scope of work.', 'The position will provide detailed information on the results of data acquisition using nondestructive testing techniques in the field and laboratory, data analysis methods, and written reports or presentations of the findings. This data may include, but not be limited to frequency response, dynamic properties of the vibration system, and stresses within the structure.', '*FDH is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer and will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.', 'Ability in analyzing experimental results, understanding modes of failure, and deriving decision rules that govern the outcome. ', 'Simulate the experimental setup, design the test bed, and identify the required equipment/apparatus to perform a successful test.', 'The primary function / purpose of this position is to develop non-destructive testing methods for assessment of heavy civil infrastructure systems such as wind turbines, dams, levees, and bridges by utilizing wave propagation principals, finite element analysis, and data interpretation. This senior position will lead in the design of experiments, collecting data in the field and laboratory, analyzing that data, and reporting the results to management.', 'Qualifications', 'Working knowledge of Finite Element Software ANSYS and ABAQUS is a plus. ', 'Ten plus years’ experience nondestructive evaluation of steel and concrete structures, signal processing algorithms and data analysis skills.', 'Review technical problem statements, perform comprehensive literature review throughout technical references, and validate applicability of different experimental and analytical methods for the desired scope of work.Develop a full scope experimental/analytical program to address problem statement.Simulate the experimental setup, design the test bed, and identify the required equipment/apparatus to perform a successful test.Design, build, and program data acquisition systems.Ensure quality and quantity of all engineering studies, reports, and drawings – provide management with appropriate report(s) on quantity and quality.General procurement and management of structures laboratory equipment.', 'Develop a full scope experimental/analytical program to address problem statement.', 'Responsibilities', 'Design, build, and program data acquisition systems.', 'General procurement and management of structures laboratory equipment.', 'Assist in code development for custom software packages with an understanding of low signal to noise ratio signal processing for efficient data collection and analysis.', 'Ensure quality and quantity of all engineering studies, reports, and drawings – provide management with appropriate report(s) on quantity and quality.', 'Experience in performing scaled laboratory, and full-scale field tests of concrete and steel structures. ', 'Enjoy Great Benefits', 'Company Description: FDH Infrastructure Services is an industry leader in engineering, construction, and field services for critical structures and facilities. Markets served include Wind Energy, telecommunications, heavy civil, power, industrial, commercial, and government. Our continued success is directly linked to the knowledge and experience of our talented staff. FDH is a team-oriented, performance-driven organization, committed to safety, quality, and professional integrity. Our work culture fosters continuous learning and innovation to improve our products, services, and business processes. We work hard for our customers and enjoy having fun together. Come grow with us!', 'Enjoy Great Benefits: FDH provides a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare, dental, vision, life and AD&D insurance, disability insurance, and a 401(k) plan with company match. Flexible time-off plans encourage a healthy work/life balance for all employees. Wellness activities are promoted throughout the year.', '\xa0', 'PHD Degree in Mechanical Engineering, Structural Engineering, or related discipline is required.', 'Experience in driving research ideas into commercial applications.', 'Possess the ability to communicate effectively with all levels of management, employees, and outside contacts both verbally and in writing.', 'Provide technical support and maintenance for integrated hardware/software packages to include electronics troubleshooting and repair.', 'Ability to organize and efficiently analyze large sets of data from ultrasonic, electromagnetic, mechanical, and seismic signals.', 'PHD Degree in Mechanical Engineering, Structural Engineering, or related discipline is required.Ten plus years’ experience nondestructive evaluation of steel and concrete structures, signal processing algorithms and data analysis skills.Experience in performing scaled laboratory, and full-scale field tests of concrete and steel structures. Ability in analyzing experimental results, understanding modes of failure, and deriving decision rules that govern the outcome. Experience in driving research ideas into commercial applications.Ability to organize and efficiently analyze large sets of data from ultrasonic, electromagnetic, mechanical, and seismic signals.Working knowledge of programming software such as C++, Python, Matlab or similar programs.Assist in code development for custom software packages with an understanding of low signal to noise ratio signal processing for efficient data collection and analysis.Provide technical support and maintenance for integrated hardware/software packages to include electronics troubleshooting and repair.Work with the team to manage project task identification and milestone schedule.Handle multiple projects simultaneously.Possess the ability to communicate effectively with all levels of management, employees, and outside contacts both verbally and in writing.Working knowledge of Finite Element Software ANSYS and ABAQUS is a plus. ', 'Handle multiple projects simultaneously.', ' ', '*VEVRAA Federal Contractor\xa0', 'Working knowledge of programming software such as C++, Python, Matlab or similar programs.']

['', 'The Hedgeye Director of Data Science will play a key role taking our data science effort to the next level by bringing data products to life that improve the quality of our research, make us better at delivering those ideas, and have a positive and tangible impact on our customers.\xa0As the Chief Data Scientist/Analyst/Wrangler/Innovator, you will examine, assess, supervise, and improve our existing data processes while creating new processes, opportunities, and products. Marrying your financial and data knowledge, you will take a cross discipline approach to execute, innovate, expand, and improve our data processes at Hedgeye.', 'Lead projects and initiatives to integrate rich data with research products', 'Bachelor’s Degree in quantitative area such as math, statistics, computer science, information management, finance or economics with an emphasis on statistical and analytical skills5+ years’ work experience building software or data products, with strong programming skills in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn,Tensorflow, XGBoost, ipytorch) and a history of integrating them into internal and customer-facing applications in production environmentsKnowledge of financial markets and investingA strong academic background in a quantitative field, for example computer science, engineering, mathematics, physics, statistics, etc.', 'Provide consultation as subject matter expert for the design, approaches and methodology needed to generate data and data products', 'Knowledge of financial markets and investing', 'KEY RESPONSIBILITIES', 'SQL skills', 'Strong Excel skillsSQL skillsA history accessing, cleaning, and extracting predictive signals from large, unstructured, and often noisy data setsExperience with time series forecasting, using machine learning (Regressions, Random Forests, etc) and predictive modelling techniquesStrong communication and interpersonal skills. Must have an interest in working in a highly collaborative research environmentExperience transforming vague problems into algorithmic solutionsExperience presenting data and using data visualization tools such as TableauExperience effectively leading teams', '*Include a cover letter with your application', 'Collaborate closely with members of the Research, Engineering, and Media Teams to shepherd ideas from the scratch paper stage all the way to a product that has a positive impact on our customers and our business', 'Experience transforming vague problems into algorithmic solutions', 'Experience with time series forecasting, using machine learning (Regressions, Random Forests, etc) and predictive modelling techniques', 'Explore new technologies, methods, and opportunities to maximize results', 'Bachelor’s Degree in quantitative area such as math, statistics, computer science, information management, finance or economics with an emphasis on statistical and analytical skills', '5+ years’ work experience building software or data products, with strong programming skills in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn,Tensorflow, XGBoost, ipytorch) and a history of integrating them into internal and customer-facing applications in production environments', 'SKILLS REQUIRED', 'Strong Excel skills', '\ufeffEDUCATION/WORK EXPERIENCE', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Must have an interest in working in a highly collaborative research environment', '\xa0', 'The Director of Data Science will work closely with the Research Team to improve existing processes, develop new data sets, and deploy cutting edge analytic techniques. Aside from planning and execution, we will count on you to explore new sources, technologies, methodologies, opportunities in the data field. You will also be counted on to present, train, propose and evangelize these approaches. You will have the opportunity to build your domain/team from scratch to match your needs and vision.', 'A history accessing, cleaning, and extracting predictive signals from large, unstructured, and often noisy data sets', 'A strong academic background in a quantitative field, for example computer science, engineering, mathematics, physics, statistics, etc.', 'Implement/supervise scripting and manage output of various product related data', 'WHAT YOU WILL DO', 'Experience presenting data and using data visualization tools such as Tableau', 'Analyze data and results for continuous improvement', 'Experience effectively leading teams', 'Collaborate closely with members of the Research, Engineering, and Media Teams to shepherd ideas from the scratch paper stage all the way to a product that has a positive impact on our customers and our businessLead projects and initiatives to integrate rich data with research productsImplement/supervise scripting and manage output of various product related dataAnalyze data and results for continuous improvementProvide consultation as subject matter expert for the design, approaches and methodology needed to generate data and data productsExplore new technologies, methods, and opportunities to maximize results', 'As a teacher, a collaborator, and a leader we look to you be the face of Data Science 2.0 at Hedgeye']

job_text: ['', 'Degree Preferred', 'Preferred Fields Of Study', 'Building machine learning models and systems, interpreting their output, and communicating the results;', 'Conducting research in a lab and publishing work is a plus.', 'Minimum Years Of Experience', 'Working within Data Processing Tools: Python (Numpy, Pandas, etc.), Spark, cloud-based solutions such as GCP DataFlow;', 'Moving models from development to production is a plus; and,', 'Build and maintain an internal and external network.', 'Keep up-to-date with developments in area of specialism.', 'Demonstrating ability to continuously learn new technologies and quickly evaluate their technical and commercial viability;', 'Working in 4-week sprint cycles to develop proof-of-concepts and prototype models that can be demoed and explained to data scientists, internal stakeholders, and clients;', 'Programming: Python, R, Java, JavaScript, C++, Unix;', 'Responsibilities', 'Demonstrating ability to experiment, fail quickly, and recognize when you need assistance vs. when you conclude that a technology is not suitable for the task;', 'Developing innovative solutions and perspectives on AI that can be published in academic journals/arXiv and shared with clients;', 'Skills', 'Preferred Knowledge/Skills', 'Basic Qualifications', "Uphold the firm's code of ethics and business conduct.", 'Staying abreast of new AI research from leading labs by reading papers and experimenting with code;', 'Share and collaborate effectively with others.', 'Understanding of machine learning algorithms (e.g. k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods, deep neural networks, etc.) and when it is appropriate to use each technique;', 'Working with hardware: sensors, robotics, GPU enabled machine learning, FPGAs, Raspberry Pis, etc.;', 'Building machine learning pipelines that ingest, clean data, and make predictions;', 'Handle, manipulate and analyse data and information responsibly.', 'Exploring new analytical technologies and evaluating their technical and commercial viability quickly; and,Conducting research in a lab and publishing work is a plus.', 'Programming: Python, R, Java, JavaScript, C++, Unix;Working with hardware: sensors, robotics, GPU enabled machine learning, FPGAs, Raspberry Pis, etc.;Demonstrating an understanding of Data Storage Technologies: SQL, NoSQL, Hadoop, cloud-based databases such as GCP BigQuery, and different storage formats (e.g. Parquet, etc.);Working within Data Processing Tools: Python (Numpy, Pandas, etc.), Spark, cloud-based solutions such as GCP DataFlow;Working within Machine Learning Libraries: Python (scikit-learn, genism, etc.), TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, Spark MLlib;Possessing knowledge of visualization tools: Python (Matplotlib, Seaborn, bokeh, etc.), JavaScript (d3); and,Productionisation and containerization technologies: GitHub, Flask, Docker, Kubernetes.', 'Productionisation and containerization technologies: GitHub, Flask, Docker, Kubernetes.', 'Demonstrating an understanding of Data Storage Technologies: SQL, NoSQL, Hadoop, cloud-based databases such as GCP BigQuery, and different storage formats (e.g. Parquet, etc.);', 'Invite and give in the moment feedback in a constructive manner.', 'Minimum Degree Required', 'Follow risk management and compliance procedures.', 'Applying machine learning techniques for addressing a variety of problems (e.g. consumer segmentation, revenue forecasting, image classification, etc.);', 'Job Requirements and Preferences', 'Exploring new analytical technologies and evaluating their technical and commercial viability quickly; ', 'Seek opportunities to learn about how PwC works as a global network of firms.', 'Testing and rejecting hypotheses around data processing and machine learning model building;', 'Working within Machine Learning Libraries: Python (scikit-learn, genism, etc.), TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, Spark MLlib;', 'Possessing knowledge of visualization tools: Python (Matplotlib, Seaborn, bokeh, etc.), JavaScript (d3); and,', 'Preferred Qualifications', "Invite and give in the moment feedback in a constructive manner.Share and collaborate effectively with others.Identify and make suggestions for improvements when problems and/or opportunities arise.Handle, manipulate and analyse data and information responsibly.Follow risk management and compliance procedures.Keep up-to-date with developments in area of specialism.Communicate confidently in a clear, concise and articulate manner - verbally and in the materials I produce.Build and maintain an internal and external network.Seek opportunities to learn about how PwC works as a global network of firms.Uphold the firm's code of ethics and business conduct.", 'Communicate confidently in a clear, concise and articulate manner - verbally and in the materials I produce.', 'Identify and make suggestions for improvements when problems and/or opportunities arise.']

['The ideal candidate will have a\xa0passion for technology\xa0with a clear, solid background in computer science. If you have a proven ability to learn, explore, and quickly turn the latest technologies into value, then you are the perfect candidate.\xa0', 'clear, solid', 'Talroo\xa0is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. Candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status, and will not be discriminated against\xa0on the basis of\xa0disability.', 'Paid company holidays & Unlimited PTO\xa0', '\xa0\xa0', 'High-performance web services –\xa0our microservices scale with\xa0Java\xa0technologies while providing\xa0sub-millisecond\xa0response times.\xa0', 'Our\xa0team of\xa0experienced engineers\xa0has deep industry experience in search/information retrieval.\xa0\xa0The team is\xa0highly collaborative while also being self-sufficient enough to turn\xa0any\xa0idea into\xa0a business win.\xa0\xa0As\xa0a high impact teammate, you will help with everything from data ETLs to modeling to model serving to test reporting. This unique opportunity will expose you to deep insights into\xa0the\xa0technology\xa0and the\xa0business.\xa0\xa0On a day-to-day basis, expect roughly 20%\xa0of your time to be on the\xa0serving/inference layer, 20% data science modeling, and the rest will be around data cleaning, ETL, and analytics.\xa0', "We are honored to be recognized as a multi-award winning\xa0organization.\xa0Talroo\xa0has been consistently recognized as a Top Workplace and a Best Place to Work in Austin. We've been ranked the last five years by Inc. 500/5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in the U.S. You'll also find us on the Austin Business Journal's Fast 50 growth awards list multiple times. We're growing the right way, and we need exceptional talent to help us build upon our successful story.\xa0", '401(k) retirement plan with 3% employer contribution\xa0', 'What we are looking for in a highly qualified candidate:\xa0', 'Five (5)\xa0to ten (10)\xa0years of computer\xa0programming\xa0work experience\xa0with proven, high-value results.\xa0', 'Big Data processing –\xa0Apache Spark\xa0is\xa0the\xa0key to our data pipelines that create our insights.\xa0Understanding SQL is a must in this environment.\xa0For maximum performance, we utilize Scala.\xa0Search technologies\xa0– our Lucene/Solr\xa0inverse index powers billions of our queries every month.\xa0High-performance web services –\xa0our microservices scale with\xa0Java\xa0technologies while providing\xa0sub-millisecond\xa0response times.\xa0Machine learning –\xa0our\xa0latest wins have come from ML technologies like\xa0gradient boosted trees (XGBoost, MML Spark)\xa0and\xa0deep learning (TensorFlow,\xa0Keras).\xa0Python is the preferred language here.\xa0Most importantly, the\xa0highly qualified candidate has the\xa0initiative and ability to quickly learn and apply the above.\xa0', 'background in computer science', 'Machine learning –\xa0our\xa0latest wins have come from ML technologies like\xa0gradient boosted trees (XGBoost, MML Spark)\xa0and\xa0deep learning (TensorFlow,\xa0Keras).\xa0Python is the preferred language here.\xa0', 'The team\xa0is working to improve many facets of the job recommendation process. This involves gathering data from billions of monthly job queries to create, test, and iterate on machine learning models. When successful, we help job seekers find their perfect job faster and employers receive a higher quality of candidate.\xa0', 'This\xa0Principal\xa0Machine Learning Engineer position is a high-impact role at\xa0Talroo.\xa0We are looking for an experienced machine learning practitioner\xa0with high-standards\xa0to help scale and expand high-value business initiatives.\xa0', 'Awesome company events\xa0', 'Talroo\xa0is a talent attraction platform – our technology helps companies find the talent they need for their workforces.\xa0We power over 1 billion job searches every month, and\xa0Talroo’s\xa0data-driven search-and-match functionality enables organizations to reach the best audiences to deliver hires. And while we focus on providing amazing results and service for our customers, within our exciting company you’ll also find a high-performance environment of collaboration, encouragement, transparency, and fun.\xa0', 'You will be joining a\xa0top-tier\xa0team that understands the real-world business opportunity that machine learning enables and how it can transform businesses.\xa0At\xa0Talroo, we iterate\xa0with\xa0A/B testing to fail fast and learn quickly. The result is real, measurable revenue and profit impact.\xa0\xa0', 'Talroo\xa0is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. Candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status, and will not be discriminated against\xa0on the basis of\xa0disability.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s or higher degree in Computer Science from a top university.\xa0Five (5)\xa0to ten (10)\xa0years of computer\xa0programming\xa0work experience\xa0with proven, high-value results.\xa0Two (2) years of\xa0data science,\xa0machine learning,\xa0or data engineering\xa0work\xa0experience.\xa0', 'Big Data processing –\xa0Apache Spark\xa0is\xa0the\xa0key to our data pipelines that create our insights.\xa0Understanding SQL is a must in this environment.\xa0For maximum performance, we utilize Scala.\xa0', 'Two (2) years of\xa0data science,\xa0machine learning,\xa0or data engineering\xa0work\xa0experience.\xa0', 'About the Position\xa0', '\xa0', 'Comprehensive, company-paid health, vision, and dental insurance premiums for you and your dependents\xa0', 'Bachelor’s or higher degree in Computer Science from a top university.\xa0', 'Benefits\xa0', 'What we are looking for in a highly qualified candidate:', 'Highly competitive salary\xa0', 'Minimum Requirements\xa0', 'Company-paid gym membership\xa0', 'Search technologies\xa0– our Lucene/Solr\xa0inverse index powers billions of our queries every month.\xa0', 'passion for technology\xa0', 'Most importantly, the\xa0highly qualified candidate has the\xa0initiative and ability to quickly learn and apply the above.\xa0', 'Highly competitive salary\xa0Company-paid gym membership\xa0Comprehensive, company-paid health, vision, and dental insurance premiums for you and your dependents\xa0401(k) retirement plan with 3% employer contribution\xa0Paid company holidays & Unlimited PTO\xa0Awesome company events\xa0', 'About\xa0Talroo\xa0']

['', 'Creative\xa0– a quick thinker who is able to solve complex cases with ingenuity and speed.', 'Why we are different', 'Tenacious', 'Tenacious\xa0– plows through barriers and navigates roadblocks as they research time-sensitive cases.', 'Besides an open vacation policy, excellent health and dental insurance, wellness days, 401(k) and a competitive salary - You will get an opportunity to work with a team of dedicated professionals - researchers, attorneys and support staff in a team office environment who strives to provide consistent, accurate information connecting heirs to their rightful inheritances.', 'Who we are', 'Qualifications', 'Sense of Urgency', 'It is on a foundation of best-in-class research capability, and a commitment to honesty, transparency, and professionalism, that we continually provide top-tier service for clients worldwide.', 'Investigative by Nature- asks a cascading set of questions to research a case. Can speak, write and get to the point when dealing with lots of data and information, can present and persuade people on the phone.', 'Detail-oriented\xa0- can make good judgments and quick decisions based on data and regularly works on projects/cases of moderate complexity.', 'The Mission\xa0', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent in years of experience with a strong preference for research and evaluation, or a related field.", 'Responsibilities', 'Our mission is to employ time-tested genealogical research and investigative methods to connect heirs to their rightful inheritances and, in some cases, re-establish long-forgotten family relationships.', 'Sense of Urgency\xa0– understands the time-sensitive nature of ARB’s business and is motivated to complete tasks quickly with a high degree of quality. Effectively balances short-term tasks with long-term goals.', 'Organized\xa0- builds high-quality plans and develops helpful documentation for all cases. With the help of others, stays on top of complex laws, regulations or situations related to a case.', 'American Research Bureau (ARB), a Utah-based company has built a durable heritage of connecting heirs with their rightful inheritances for more than 80 years.', 'Friendly and Persuasive', 'Creative\xa0', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent in years of experience with a strong preference for research and evaluation, or a related field.Investigative by Nature- asks a cascading set of questions to research a case. Can speak, write and get to the point when dealing with lots of data and information, can present and persuade people on the phone.", 'What you’ll get', 'Creative\xa0– a quick thinker who is able to solve complex cases with ingenuity and speed.Friendly and Persuasive\xa0– a natural conversationalist who rapidly builds relationships of trust, is an\xa0intuitive listener\xa0and is able to influence potential clients on the telephoneTenacious\xa0– plows through barriers and navigates roadblocks as they research time-sensitive cases.Detail-oriented\xa0- can make good judgments and quick decisions based on data and regularly works on projects/cases of moderate complexity.Sense of Urgency\xa0– understands the time-sensitive nature of ARB’s business and is motivated to complete tasks quickly with a high degree of quality. Effectively balances short-term tasks with long-term goals.Organized\xa0- builds high-quality plans and develops helpful documentation for all cases. With the help of others, stays on top of complex laws, regulations or situations related to a case.', "Our client is on a mission to employ time-tested genealogical research and investigative methods to connect people to their rightful inheritances and, in some cases, re-establish long-forgotten family relationships. The client's work is built on a foundation of best-in-class research capability, and a commitment to honesty, transparency, and professionalism, that continually provide top-tier service for clients worldwide.", 'Researcher', 'Like an unsolved mystery, the people at ARB enjoy searching the past to solve the mysteries of the present. With a best-in-class research team - employing proprietary data gathering techniques and technologies - ARB has a unique capacity for success. Hard work and passion moves us forward but we derive our greatest satisfaction from that moment in a client engagement when it becomes certain we’ve accomplished what we set out to do.', 'With minimal supervision, the\xa0Researcher will work with the research director as a member of the research team in assessing cases that present a financial opportunity for ARB. This job will be\xa0focused on conducting internal research and then\xa0calling and connecting with potential heirs to cultivate relationships into clients for ARB.\xa0Strong ability to multi-task,\xa0prioritize and develop a trusting rapport with people over the phone. The successful candidate will be\xa0assertive and enjoys being on the phone with people without the high\xa0pressure of unreasonable sales quotas.\xa0The work involves continuous new and moderately complex cases each day and much of the work will include the following:', 'intuitive listener', 'Friendly and Persuasive\xa0– a natural conversationalist who rapidly builds relationships of trust, is an\xa0intuitive listener\xa0and is able to influence potential clients on the telephone', 'Detail-oriented\xa0', 'Organized\xa0', 'We are honest brokers in helping to connect people with rightful assets, with long-forgotten relatives and, most importantly, with well-deserved peace of mind.']

['', 'Primary responsibility is to coordinate the development, clinical, manufacturing, product transfer, and scale-up batches of new products and processes at the Pharmaceutical site in Wilson, NC as well as at third-party partner sites.\xa0This includes such tasks as batch record preparation, protocol generation, scheduling, raw material acquisition, and travel for on-site supervision of batch manufacture.', 'o If the Scientist experiences a production problem, they are expected to troubleshoot and call on additional resources (experienced operator, process engineers, maintenance, quality specialist) as needed to resolve issues.\xa0\xa0', 'Responsible for evaluating and qualifying sources of raw materials.', 'Wilson, NC for our clients ', 'Responsible for new product evaluation.\xa0Additionally, will interface with clinical, regulatory, R&D, operations and quality to ensure proper development of new products.\xa0Will be responsible for coordination of all activities within pilot plant /operations and laboratory areas.\xa0\xa0', 'Supervisor Responsibilities (if applicable)', 'The Pharm Tech Scientist reports administratively to the Senior Manager or Assistant Director, Pharmaceutical Technology.', '\ufeffKey objectives include clinical / manufacturing support, transfer of new products to the North Carolina as well as our external third-party partner sites and alternative API qualification. Additional responsibilities include troubleshooting and reformulation of problem products, product lifecycle development, product portfolio enhancement, and providing technical expertise and support to Production Investigations.\xa0Other key objectives include generation, execution, and reporting of development, DOE’s, product, cleaning, and equipment validation protocols, new production / equipment selection and evaluation, rework evaluation of rejected batches and new/existing raw material evaluation.', 'The Pharm Tech Scientist, from time to time, be responsible for supervision of production supervisors, production operators, and other personnel in completion of the required batch manufacture functions.\xa0\xa0', 'Primary responsibility is to coordinate the development, clinical, manufacturing, product transfer, and scale-up batches of new products and processes at the Pharmaceutical site in Wilson, NC as well as at third-party partner sites.\xa0This includes such tasks as batch record preparation, protocol generation, scheduling, raw material acquisition, and travel for on-site supervision of batch manufacture.Responsible for identifying potential product/process improvements of existing commercial dosage forms.
