job_title: VP, Surveillance Design and Implementation -- Data Scientist
job_text: ['', 'US', 'Bachelor’s degree in business, finance, and/or engineering experience in data science, quantitative research/analysis, advanced statistical methods, and/or data modeling;experience and/or designing communications surveillance and/or trade surveillance; experience in a surveillance function (or similar) within compliance, or other control-related function in the financial services firm, regulatory organization consulting firm, or a combination thereofAdvanced degree (e.g.MS or MBA) preferredGrade :All Job LevelAll Job FunctionsAll Job LevelAll Job FunctionsUSTime Type :Full timeCiti is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer.Minority/Female/Veteran/Individuals with Disabilities/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity.Citigroup Inc. and its subsidiaries ("Citi”) invite all qualified interested applicants to apply for career opportunities. If you are a person with a disability and need a reasonable accommodation to use our search tools and/or apply for a career opportunityCLICK HERE .To view the "EEO is the Law" posterCLICK HERETo view the EEO is the Law SupplementCLICK HERETo view the EEO Policy StatementCLICK HERETo view the Pay Transparency PostingCLICK HERE .', 'All Job Functions', 'Three or more years of experience in data science, machine learning, quantitative research, quantitative analysis, advanced statistical methods, surveillance design, and/or data modeling requiredExperience designing and prototyping surveillance patterns using time series analysis, features engineering, random forest, natural language processing, and/or advanced statistical methods highly desirable;Prior experience managing and delivering surveillance projects highly desirableExpertise of Compliance laws, rules, regulations, risks and typologiesStrong skills in organizing workflow, ideas and materialsExperience with drafting Business Requirement Documentation (BRD)Excellent written, verbal and analytical skillsMust be a self-starter, flexible, innovative and adaptiveHighly motivated, strong attention to detail, team oriented, organizedStrong presentation skills with the ability to articulate complex problems and solutions through concise and clear messagingAbility to work collaboratively with regional and global partners in other functional units; ability to navigate a complex organization; to influence and lead people across cultures at a senior levelExperience in managing regulatory exams and relationships with examiners, auditors, etc.Awareness of regulatory requirements including local and US laws, international and industry standards', 'To view the EEO Policy StatementCLICK HERE', 'To view the Pay Transparency PostingCLICK HERE .', 'All Job FunctionsAll Job Level', 'To view the EEO is the Law SupplementCLICK HERE', 'Serves as a senior compliance risk officer for Independent Compliance Risk Management (ICRM)’s Surveillance Model Design and Implementation Team responsible for the design, implementation, and oversight for a suite of surveillances designed to detect behaviors that may violate regulatory rules or internal policies and procedures. When potentially anomalous behavior is detected, the team is responsible for working collaboratively with partners across the first and second lines of defense to determine the appropriate resolution of the matter, which may include employee discipline. The ICRM Global Surveillance platform encompasses a number of surveillance related portfolios including trade surveillance, e-communications and voice surveillance, employee trading, outside activities surveillance, and information barrier surveillance.Key Activities include:Creating, enhancing and implementing surveillance scenarios and conducting surveillance reviews. Improving surveillance tools and applications by coordinating with Information Technology on the timely implementation of enhancements and proactively addressing potential issues.Participating in ad-hoc requests, special projects and regulatory exams directed by other organizations within the compliance or legal departments.Other responsibilities include: overseeing the monitoring to adherence to ICRM’s Risk Policies and relevant procedures; preparing, editing and maintaining Compliance program related materials; interacting and working with other areas within Citi, as necessary; and keeping abreast of regulatory changes, new regulations and internal policy changes in order to further identify new key risk areas.Interacting with global counterparts in regards to the governance of their surveillance portfolio.Additional duties as assigned']

['', 'Job Description', 'As a technical expert, provide synthetic organic chemistry perspectives to other teams in the antisense oligonucleotide (ASO) organization engaged in the development of our end-to-end manufacturing process and execution of the manufacturing process.Travel to Cambridge (when needed)to lead, participate, and perform scale-up of the synthesis to provide preclinical materials in our Cambridge laboratories.Write research reports and present results internally and externally.Performing organic process research and development of small molecules, oligonucleotides, and conjugates.', 'As a technical expert, provide synthetic organic chemistry perspectives to other teams in the antisense oligonucleotide (ASO) organization engaged in the development of our end-to-end manufacturing process and execution of the manufacturing process.', 'Travel to Cambridge (when needed)to lead, participate, and perform scale-up of the synthesis to provide preclinical materials in our Cambridge laboratories.', 'Education', 'Areas of specialization should reside in the fields of synthetic organic chemistry with a deep understanding of reactivity and reaction mechanisms. Experience in nucleosides, nucleotides, oligonucleotides, solid-phase synthesis, automation or programming of instruments, such as oligonucleotide synthesizer, is preferred. The ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team environment, design and execute experiments, collect and interpret data, and effectively communicate in written and oral forms are essential. The individual must be self-driven, an independent thinker, vigorous and thorough in conducting experiments, collecting and interpreting data, drawing conclusions, and making recommendations.', 'Areas of specialization should reside in the fields of synthetic organic chemistry with a deep understanding of reactivity and reaction mechanisms. ', 'Responsibilities', 'The individual must be self-driven, an independent thinker, vigorous and thorough in conducting experiments, collecting and interpreting data, drawing conclusions, and making recommendations.', 'Qualifications', 'Experience in nucleosides, nucleotides, oligonucleotides, solid-phase synthesis, automation or programming of instruments, such as oligonucleotide synthesizer, is preferred. ', 'Performing organic process research and development of small molecules, oligonucleotides, and conjugates.', 'The ability to work both independently and collaboratively within a team environment, design and execute experiments, collect and interpret data, and effectively communicate in written and oral forms are essential. ', 'Write research reports and present results internally and externally.']

job_title: National Security Solutions Data Scientist (Clearance Required)
job_text: ['Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.', '3+ years of professional experience developing and deploying machine learning solutions.', 'Hands-on experience with a cloud services provider', 'Understanding of NLP topics, including event and topic detection, named entity extraction, relation extraction, text classification and sentiment analysis models', 'Experience working with Elasticsearch', 'If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at info@primer.com.', 'What You’ll Do', 'Perform modeling tasks in support of prototypes and proofs-of-concept', 'Project management skills', 'Partner with our product management and engineering teams to identify and prioritize feature development based on customer feedback', "At Primer we use machine learning and natural language processing to automate the analysis of very large corpora of unstructured text. We build systems that read documents, extract insights, and write reports comparable to those of a human analyst. Our objective is to help our customers understand the world around them –– from geopolitical events and scientific research to changes in the risk profiles of companies. Our clients include some of the world’s largest corporations, financial institutions, and government agencies.\xa0You can learn more about Primer's technology and the sort of problems we solve at\xa0our blog, as well as recent\xa0media coverage\xa0of our work.", 'Bonus Points', 'Engage with customers and prospects to understand their problems and scope technical solutions', 'Requirements', 'You are an experienced data scientist with a passion for problem solving. You thrive on applying cutting-edge solutions to meaningful problems. Natural language processing intrigues you.\xa0Does this sound like you? As a Data Scientist at Primer, you’ll leverage your machine learning expertise to help national security organizations solve some of their toughest challenges.\xa0', 'Familiarity with container and orchestration technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes', "Primer is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. Please see the United States Department of Labor's EEO poster and EEO poster supplement for additional information.", 'Primer', 'Full-stack development skills (including front-end)', '3+ years of Python experience', 'Produce technical content in support of national security focused business development and marketing', 'Active TS/SCI clearance', 'The world is changing at an accelerating rate and understanding the shifting landscapes has never been more critical.\xa0Primer\xa0is the premier artificial-intelligence powered platform that allows humans to get information that they need, instantly, in ways that until now have not been possible.\xa0We believe that truth is knowable; our mission is to free the curious to be their most human. We are building machines that can read natural language text documents, understand them, correlate them into events, and share what they learn by writing their own natural language text documents.\xa0', 'This position is specifically for work on a federal contract.\xa0The federal contract requires that all individuals working on this project be citizens of the United States', '\xa0', 'Explain machine learning concepts to non-technical stakeholders', 'United States citizenship is required for this position as a result of contractual requirements with the United States government.', 'Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, statistics, computational linguistics, or another quantitative field', 'Hands-on experience with machine learning and NLP tools and libraries such as Numpy, Scipy, Scikit-learn, SpaCy, NLTK, Tensorflow, Keras and PyTorch', 'Linux proficiency - you’ll need to know your way around a Linux shell in order to run our software', 'Experience working in a customer success role', 'Train, deploy, and tune machine learning models on customer data sets', 'Direct experience with the isolated C2S region of AWS', 'Strong communication skills - you’ll be the face of Primer to customers', 'Experience working on an Agile development team', 'Ability to think about solutions from a customer perspective, establish conceptual connections between requirements and solutions']

company: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
job_text: ['', 'Some travel to conferences, local sponsor sites, or support for field testing may be required.', 'As an Environmental Data Science Post-Doctoral Researcher…', 'You Meet Our Desired Qualifications If You…', ' Have experience working with an interdisciplinary team. Have experience in business development, writing technical proposals, or pitching new research programs to government agencies. Have experience working with other artificial intelligence technologies, including computer vision, reinforcement learning, neural networks, natural language processing, robotic control, or high performance computing clusters. ', ' Some travel to conferences, local sponsor sites, or support for field testing may be required. ', 'The ability to obtain a Secret security clearance. If selected, you will be subject to a government security clearance investigation and must meet the requirements for access to classified information. Eligibility requirements include U.S. citizenship.', 'You will propose novel projects, write and present technical papers, and present your work at conferences.', 'You will regularly publish and present your research findings to internal and external audiences, which include management, technical communities of practice, sponsors, and external collaborators in industry, academia, and government.', 'Your primary responsibility will be to conduct novel research in the areas of data science and machine learning to understand, mitigate, and adapt to the rapidly changing environment.', 'or', 'Have a Ph.D. in a subject area related to Data Science (e.g., Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, or Engineering)orEnvironmental Sciences (e.g., Oceanography, Atmospheric Sciences, Earth Sciences, Hydrology, Environmental Engineering, Agricultural Science, etc.).', 'Have experience working with other artificial intelligence technologies, including computer vision, reinforcement learning, neural networks, natural language processing, robotic control, or high performance computing clusters.', 'You will lead and collaborate on technical proposals to grow and define machine learning and computer vision research in Intelligent Systems.', 'Are proficient in Python, Java, Matlab, R, or another tool used for scientific data analysis.', 'Have experience using machine learning to analyze environmental data sets or models, e.g. Earth systems (e.g. oceanography, atmospheric sciences), power, water, food, sensor systems, and ecological restoration. ', 'Have experience in business development, writing technical proposals, or pitching new research programs to government agencies.', ' Your primary responsibility will be to conduct novel research in the areas of data science and machine learning to understand, mitigate, and adapt to the rapidly changing environment. You will propose novel projects, write and present technical papers, and present your work at conferences. You will provide technical leadership and vision for multidisciplinary research teams to apply cutting-edge research in Intelligent Systems to Environmental problems. You will lead and collaborate on technical proposals to grow and define machine learning and computer vision research in Intelligent Systems. You will regularly publish and present your research findings to internal and external audiences, which include management, technical communities of practice, sponsors, and external collaborators in industry, academia, and government. ', 'You will provide technical leadership and vision for multidisciplinary research teams to apply cutting-edge research in Intelligent Systems to Environmental problems.', 'Have experience working with an interdisciplinary team.', 'Have excellent communication skills and work well in a collaborative environment.', ' Have a Ph.D. in a subject area related to Data Science (e.g., Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, or Engineering)orEnvironmental Sciences (e.g., Oceanography, Atmospheric Sciences, Earth Sciences, Hydrology, Environmental Engineering, Agricultural Science, etc.). Have experience using machine learning to analyze environmental data sets or models, e.g. Earth systems (e.g. oceanography, atmospheric sciences), power, water, food, sensor systems, and ecological restoration.  Have excellent communication skills and work well in a collaborative environment. Are proficient in Python, Java, Matlab, R, or another tool used for scientific data analysis. The ability to obtain a Secret security clearance. If selected, you will be subject to a government security clearance investigation and must meet the requirements for access to classified information. Eligibility requirements include U.S. citizenship. ']

job_title: Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Streaming | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston
job_text: ['', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Casual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratchLead the migration to AWS as a hands-on technical leaderAct as a critical thought leader, consulting and mentoring other teams as your new systems transform the way this entire firm leverages data', "One of Boston's top Hedge Funds has had an elite track record of success over the past 4.5 years; they have doubled their AUM, and now have $100+ Billion in AUM. They are building out a new cloud team to redefine the scope and performance of their data processing systems and infrastructure. This team will work in a greenfield environment, designing brand new systems from scratch.", 'BS or equivalent degree8+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experienceSignificant expertise with multiple AWS services (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', 'Significant expertise with multiple AWS services (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)', 'Lead the migration to AWS as a hands-on technical leader', 'BS or equivalent degree', 'Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratch', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0\xa0', 'One of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the business', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation packageOne of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the businessCasual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', 'Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Streaming | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston', 'In this role, you will architect and implement AWS, Big Data, and streaming solutions to massively increase the scale of data that the quantitative research, analytics, and trading teams are able to leverage. This team has already identified AWS, Big Data, and HPC technologies to build their initial POCs, but you will be asked to introduce new technologies as development progresses.', '8+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experience', 'Capitalize on:', '\xa0', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Act as a critical thought leader, consulting and mentoring other teams as your new systems transform the way this entire firm leverages data', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation package', 'Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive trading systems']

["Experience building and optimizing 'big data' data pipelines, architectures and data sets", 'Performs additional related duties as assigned.', 'Participates in project meetings with other technical staff, business owners and subject matter experts.', 'Ability to estimate work effort for project sub-plans or small projects and ensure the project is successfully completed', "Black Knight is the premier provider of integrated technology, services, data and analytics that lenders and servicers look to first to help successfully manage the entire loan life cycle. Our deep understanding of regulatory and compliance issues complements the knowledge, technology and solutions we offer to help our clients achieve their business goals. Black Knight offers leading software systems; data and analytics offerings; and information solutions that facilitate and automate many of the business processes across the mortgage life cycle.  JOB FAMILY DESCRIPTION  As a Data Engineer II for Black Knight's Innovation Lab, you will join a team of 15+ developers and product enthusiasts engineering a next generation Artificially Intelligent Virtual Assistant known as AIVA. AIVA works alongside operators, loan officers and lenders to make their jobs more efficient. Each quarter, she reads millions of documents and then summarizes significant data points for her colleagues to review. Although she's early career, she already has cut down certain manual tasks from 30 minutes to just 8 minutes! Our team employs leading-edge cloud computing technology and leverage Amazon Web Services to build AIVA's infrastructure. Her make-up is well beyond mainstream workflow automation/RPA. We're continuously training AIVA's lexicon to give her context what she's studying. We tinker with algorithms and build deep learning networks to fortify her skill sets as she reads through bank statements, pay stubs, W2s and more. Most importantly, we capitalize on large data sets from our enterprise clients so we can optimize our feature selection at scale. Each day we train AIVA so that she can save people from millions of hours of stare-and compare work. We know with AIVA in the workforce, she can free her colleagues' time, talent and imaginations to develop new skills, provide better service, and to become more engaged at work.  There is room for a range of skills. Some you already have and some you will quickly gain when you are here. ['', 'Specific experience and strength in qualitative methods.', 'is calling a UX Researcher to our location in Seattle, WA.', 'Ensuring that research data are consistently and accurately gathered, broadly communicated and archived.', "Master's Degree in Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, Psychology, or related social science.", 'Qualifications', " Bachelor's Degree in Human-Computer Interaction, Human Factors, Psychology, or related social science or equivalent education/experience. 4 years UX research experience; and experience with enterprise level products and services. 4 years significant experience with multiple user research methodologies that span the product development life cycle from conceptualization to launch. ['', "We're Vested You won’t just own your work here, you’ll have the potential to own equity in Cruise, too. ", "We're Vested", 'We also consider for employment qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with applicable laws. And, if you believe that you will need any type of accommodation, please let us know.Note to Recruitment Agencies: Cruise does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. ['', '-Expert knowledge on how to test processes that affect data', 'Experience:', '-Produce and maintain accurate test plans and test system overview documentation.', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0Direct Hire', '-Interact cross-functionally with a wide variety of people and teams. Work closely with development teams outside the Data Engineering group, including, Business Intelligence Developers, Product Development, and Data Scientists, who will use the data being delivered.', 'FLSA:\xa0Non-Exempt', "Education:\xa0Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent experience\xa0", 'FLSA:', '-Be an active participant in the development process and possess an understanding of the intent of the design and the desired outcomes of the Data Engineering team members.', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:', 'POSITION:\xa0SQA Data Engineer', '-Familiarity with visual data analysis using tools such as Tableau or other Business Intelligence platforms', '\ufeffPersonal Attributes:', 'The Data Engineer (Quality) is responsible for designing, developing, and executing test plans for automated ETL processes. This role will be part of a team adopting and implementing new data technologies and tools like Snowflake, Spark, Hadoop, HDFS, MongoDB and/or others to provide faster, more accurate, and deeper insights into our products and services. As a member of the growing data services and business analytics team, this person will be a key contributor to the successful deployment of strategic future state capabilities critical for our business. As a Data Engineer who is focused on evaluating the quality of the solutions others build, this person is responsible for producing methods of testing the quality of code produced by our Data Engineering staff and adherence to Data Engineering developed standards. This individual will also monitor jobs for performance and error as well as make/suggest changes to address those concerns by working with the members of the Data Engineering team and the Database Administrator. This position will be responsible for designing, documenting, automating, executing, and maintaining test plans and reporting back to the author the results. This individual will implement moderate to complex test scripts to test the functionality.', '-Detail oriented', '-Analytical', 'POSITION:', 'DIRECT REPORTS:\xa0No', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with SQL as a developer or as a member of a quality team required.', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0', '-Moderate to advanced working knowledge of Microsoft Transact-SQL (T-SQL) or ANSI SQL and demonstrated ability to create ad-hoc SQL queries to analyze data, create prototypes, etc.', 'DIRECT REPORTS:', '-Passionate about data', 'DEPARTMENT:', 'ABOUT THE JOB:', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0Data Services\xa0', '-Minimum 1 year of experience with MS SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB preferred.', '-Strong verbal and written communication skills', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', '-Quality driven', '-Occasionally take on special projects and additional duties.\xa0', 'Education:', '-Minimum 1 year of experience with database design and/or development required.', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0', '-Collaborate with various data providers to evaluate and help resolve data issues.', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0\xa0N/A', '-Design, document, create, test, and report on the quality of the individual modules, jobs, functions, stored procedures, SQL scripts, etc.', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0Solutions Architect, Data Services', '-Under general guidance from other team members and the Quality Department, design effective and maintainable test scripts that can be automated or run as needed to ensure the solution meets the gathered requirements, as well as, meets reliability, accuracy, and performance standards.', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', '-Review for existing standards and adjust to new standards as they mature.', '-Committed to personal development and professional growth', 'The Data Services team mission is to unify data across the enterprise to optimize the business decisions made at the strategic, tactical, and operational levels of the organization. We accomplish this by providing an Enterprise Data Warehouse, reporting platform, and business processes that can provide quality data, in a timely fashion, from any channel of the company and present it in such a manner to maximize the value of that data for both internal and external customers.', '-Experience with big data technologies like Snowflake, Spark, Scala, Kafka, Hbase, Hadoop, HDFS, AVRO, MongoDB are also a plus.', '-Positive and creative attitude']

['', '● 20% of Time:', 'The University of Minnesota Genomics Center (UMGC) operates a CLIA certified laboratory focused on providing SARS-nCoV2 (COVID) assurance testing for communities in Minnesota, Western Wisconsin, and Northern Iowa. We have multiple Researcher 2 openings available.', '● A willingness to work in a fast-paced, high volume laboratory.', 'Required:', '● Ability to work in a HIPAA environment.', '● Experience with high throughput workflows.', 'Manufacturing Technicians Job duties:', 'About the Job', '○ Prepare and Ship specimen collection components to UMGC clients.', '● Comfortable handling biological specimens.', '○ Verify the accuracy, validity, and completion of all data entered into the laboratory information management system (LIMS).', '● Flexibility in changing job duties.', '● Bachelor’s degree in Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, or a related discipline or a combination of related education and experience to equal 4 years.', '○ Receive and inventory all reagents/ lab supplies coming into the UMGC.', '● High attention to detail.', 'Accessioning/Manufacturing technicians are responsible for receiving, evaluating, and entering specimens into UMGC’s COVID laboratory information management system (LIMS). Tasks will also extend to procurement, inventory, and distribution of laboratory supplies. Operate under BSL2 Plus conditions with proper PPE\xa0while handling samples. Additional tasks will include preparation and shipment of specimen collection components to clients; preparation of proprietary reagents, and general laboratory duties as assigned by the direct supervisor.', 'Preferred:', '\ufeff', '○ Receive samples coming into the UMGC.', '● Ability to lift 50 lbs.', '○ Executing molecular procedures in Biosafety Cabinet (BSL2) hood.', '● Ability to be on your feet for > 80% of shift.', '○ Execute SOPs for inactivation, extraction.', '○ Inspect and ensure all samples meet quality control specifications.', '○ Assist with making proprietary reagents needed in COVID workflow', '● Experience in a CLIA or CAP regulated molecular biology or genomics lab.', '○ Executing molecular procedures in Biosafety Cabinet (BSL2)', '○ Assist with miscellaneous tasks assigned by the direct supervisor.', '○ Verify the accuracy, validity, and completion of all data entered into the LIMS system.', 'Shift:', '● 80% of Time:', '○ Assist with general laboratory management/maintenance.', 'First, Second or Third shift.', 'This is a temporary position lasting six months to one year with possible extension based on funding.', '● Ability to identify problems and troubleshoot experiments.', 'Weekend Shift', 'To apply, please go to https://hr.myu.umn.edu/jobs/ext/337803', 'The University of Minnesota Genomics Center (UMGC) provides genomic technologies and services to researchers and clinicians at the University of Minnesota, and to external academic and industry scientists throughout the United States and internationally. We strive to keep pace with the ever-broadening world of “omics” technologies and to expand our role at the university and the wider biotech community.', '● Adherence to all laboratory and regulatory safety guidelines.', '○ Scanning and staging samples entering the COVID workflow.', '○ Ensure all workstations are stocked with supplies as specified by the direct supervisor.', 'Accessing Technicians Job duties:', '● Excellent communication skills.']

['', 'Additional Job Information', 'Demonstrates proficiency in all areas of mathematical analysis methods, machine learning, statistical analyses, and predictive modeling and advanced in-depth specialization in some areas', 'Aetna continues to build a world-class Data Science organization to capture data, understand context, generate insights and react in real time. We engage our business partners, providing solutions to improve the consumer experience, increase efficiencies, and optimize health outcomes for our members through leveraging cutting edge technology.', 'Fundamental Components', '7-10 years of progressively complex related experienceDemonstrates proficiency in all areas of mathematical analysis methods, machine learning, statistical analyses, and predictive modeling and advanced in-depth specialization in some areasSolid understanding of health care industryDeep knowledge of advanced analytics tools and languages to analyze large data sets from multiple data sources.Strong skills to effectively communicate and\xa0negotiate across the business and in the external health care environmentDemonstrates strong ability to communicate technical concepts and implications to business partners.Strong organizational, management and leadership skills.Excellent analytical and problem solving skills.Comprehensive knowledge of health care industry, products, systems, business strategies and productsClinically oriented background or professional experience is a plus', 'Comprehensive knowledge of health care industry, products, systems, business strategies and products', '\xa0\xa0', 'Excellent analytical and problem solving skills.', 'Demonstrates strong ability to communicate technical concepts and implications to business partners.', "Looking for opportunities to use cutting edge technologies analyzing petabytes of data in a world class Hadoop cluster? Interested in generating analytical insights that inform provider networks and engagement strategies that support members on their individualized health and wellness journey? Aetna's Provider & Network Analytics team delivers strategically impactful programs and tools that expand convenient access to high-quality and affordable care for all members across multiple channels across all stages of life.", 'The Lead Data Scientist manages and is responsible for the successful delivery of the algorithms, statistical models and reporting tools to meet business needs. Acts as the analytic team lead for large and complex projects involving multiple resources and tasks, providing individual mentoring in support of company objectives.', 'Aetna is about more than just doing a job. This is our opportunity to re-shape healthcare for America and across the globe. We are developing solutions to improve the quality and affordability of healthcare. What we do will benefit generations to come.', 'We care about each other, our customers and our communities. We are inspired to make a difference, and we are committed to integrity and excellence. Together we will empower people to live healthier lives.', 'Job Description', 'At Aetna, we’re pioneering a total approach to health and wellness. As a Data Scientist on the Analytics & Behavior Change team, you’ll build industry-leading analytics, data, and technology platforms to help reimagine health care. This positions will play a critical role within a\xa0cross-functional team, delivering powerful solutions that inform network strategy and design, improve network performance and provider engagement, develop new provider offerings, and enhance consumer experience. You will be part of a fast-paced, innovative, collaborative team, helping solve problems, drive impact, and deliver key insights to our customers by leveraging innovations in data science, machine & deep learning, and predictive modeling techniques.\xa0You will derive meaning from data and deploy robust solutions through provider-directed engagement channels (e.g., digital) that helps consumers identify affordable care, when they need it, and with whom.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Deep knowledge of advanced analytics tools and languages to analyze large data sets from multiple data sources.', 'Clinically oriented background or professional experience is a plus', 'Strong organizational, management and leadership skills.', "The highest level of education desired for candidates in this position Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Business Analytics, Economics, Physics, Engineering, or related discipline.", 'Develops complex algorithms and statistical predictive models and determines analytical approaches and modeling techniques to evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes. Performs analyses of structured and unstructured data to solve multiple and complex business problems. utilizing advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analyses and specialized expertise in the organization and/or industry. Applies analytical rigor and statistical methods to analyze large amounts of data, using advanced statistical techniques. Manages large and complex analytical projects from data exploration, model building, performance evaluation and testing. Behaves as mentor to junior team members to provide technical advice. Collaborates with business partners to develop technical /business approaches and new or enhanced technical tools. Interacts with internal and external peers and management to share highly complex information related to areas of expertise and/or to gain acceptance of new or enhanced technology / business solutions.', 'BACKGROUND/EXPERIENCE Desired', 'Strong skills to effectively communicate and\xa0negotiate across the business and in the external health care environment', 'Aetna is an equal opportunity & affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment regardless of personal characteristics or status. We take affirmative action to recruit, select and develop women, people of color, veterans and individuals with disabilities.', 'Solid understanding of health care industry', 'EDUCATION', 'Master’s degree or PhD preferred', '7-10 years of progressively complex related experience']

['', 'The trainee will perform research in adoptive T cell immunotherapy, focused on Good Manufacturing Practices, under the direction of Dr. Catherine Bollard and Dr. Patrick Hanley with the goal of learning the skills and knowledge necessary to translate cell therapies into clinical trials and manage projects in a GMP facility. Work involves manufacture of clinical grade cell therapy products for human use. Eligible candidates must have a fundamental understanding of regulatory agency governance and be able to develop and apply elements and requirements of a quality system, evaluate various types of audits and self-inspections, and analyze documents and record management systems. Applicants must have a thorough understanding of sterile manufacturing systems along with the ability to analyze master and completed batch records. Other eligibility requirements include an understanding of product manufacturing, phase appropriate GMP requirements, control procedures and contamination controls.\xa0\xa0', 'Minimum Education', '(Keywords: Immunology, cell or cellular therapy, immunotherapy, immunity, harnessing immune system)', 'The Center for Cancer Immunology Research department within Children\'s National Hospital is seeking a full-time Research Postdoctoral Fellow. The Fellow is a "research trainee" for the purpose of enhancing and developing research competencies. This person will assists faculty in the conduct of research and reports to a principal investigator or CRI Center Director. He/she can serve in several roles in the laboratory setting depending on the scientific specialty and needs of the research project supported. He/she will participate directly in the design and conduct of experiments and therefore needs technical knowledge and subject matter expertise encompassing several disciplines such as molecular and cellular biology, biochemistry, genetics, physiology or animal science. Based on experience the research post-doctoral fellow may train technical staff, graduate students and others in laboratory procedures may provide general supervision in the laboratory and assists with data management and analysis. In addition, the research post-doc fellow will be responsible for assisting the principal investigator in the planning and execution research projects, grant applications and publications. May further assist in the management of resource allocations, and may manage day-to-day activities in the laboratory, such as purchasing, oversight of laboratory animals, radioactivity, and biosafety issues. May guide or lead the work of peers, technicians or other diverse support staff as necessary to achieve specific assignments or complete large and complex projects.', 'Completed training in a specialty in a field of research; demonstrated potential for successful career in research and related scholarly achievement. (Required)', "\ufeffAbout Children's National", 'Specific Requirements', 'Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) or Medical Doctor (M.D.)', "Children's National Hospital, based in Washington, DC, celebrates 150 years of pediatric care, research and commitment to community. Volunteers opened the hospital in 1870 with 12 beds for children displaced after the Civil War. Today, 150 years stronger, it is among the nation's top 10 children's hospitals. It is ranked No. 1 for newborn care for the fourth straight year and ranked in all specialties evaluated by U.S. News & World Report. Children's National is transforming pediatric medicine for all children. In 2020, construction will be complete on the Children's National Research & Innovation Campus, the first in the nation dedicated to pediatric research. Children's National has been designated twice as a Magnet® hospital, demonstrating the highest standards of nursing and patient care delivery. This pediatric academic health system offers expert care through a convenient, community-based primary care network and specialty outpatient centers in the D.C., metropolitan area, including the Maryland and Northern Virginia suburbs. Children's National is home to the Children's National Research Institute and Sheikh Zayed Institute for Pediatric Surgical Innovation and is the nation's seventh-highest NIH-funded children’s hospital. It is recognized for its expertise and innovation in pediatric care, and as a strong voice for children through advocacy at the local, regional and national levels.", 'Research Postdoctoral Fellow - Center for Cancer Immunology Research (190002J5)']

We partner with Product and Engineering, as well as various other business teams across the enterprise. ', 'What are the top five skills and number of years of experience required to perform this job?', 'Prescreening Questions: Must be submitted on resume, no exceptions!', 'The most successful candidate will be someone who embraces the value partners bring to the Experience Design space, is forward-thinking, progressive, understands the retail world and has a past track record of significant accomplishments in Experience Design.', 'Present clear and actionable findings to various levels of stakeholders.', '7+ years of experience conducting and evaluating qualitative user experience research methods including heuristic evaluation, usability testing, concept testing, field research, ethnography, discovery research, paper prototyping, remote research and guerilla methods.', 'CUA or NNG certification.', '7+ years of experience (or equivalent experience) delivering digital solutions to a variety of industries', 'Strong ability to collaborate and assert a point of view positively', 'What is your favorite research methodology? Describe how you have used this in action, and what the results looked like.', ' Comfortable working in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment and have the ability to self-define tasks, deadlines, and next steps as needed. Leads and oversees research process within the assigned product space including recommending appropriate methodology, scoping, planning, and prepping for in-person and remote studies. Work with team members and broader research team to ensure the needs of product are being met and uncover new ways to operationalize the way the team is working/partnering. Through secondary and exploratory research, conducts a thorough analysis of existing data to generate insights and recommendations aligned with corporate strategic directions. Partners with other product research teams to align on cross-functional needs and prioritization of work. Able to synthesize in the moment and quickly articulate outcomes by utilizing a co-experience mindset. Present clear and actionable findings to various levels of stakeholders. Grow and foster partnership with XD and Product. ', 'The Sr. Researcher serves as a practice expert to build partnerships with product and design by educating, collaborating, and evolving the product experience. ']

['DAT Solutions offers competitive compensation and an excellent benefit package that includes medical, dental, and vision coverage, flexible savings accounts, 401K, Life and AD&D insurance, a comprehensive Paid Leave program, and a Tuition Reimbursement program.', 'DAT Solutions is a next-generation SaaS technology company that has been at the leading edge of innovation in trucking, freight, and transportation supply chain logistics for 42 years. We wrote the book on freight automation, and continue to transform the industry year over year by deploying a suite of software solutions to millions of customers every day - customers who depend on DAT for the deepest, broadest, most relevant data, and accurate insights, to help them make intelligent business decisions and successfully run their companies. We operate the largest truckload freight marketplace in North America, with 183 million freight matches in 2019, and a database of $118 billion of global shipment annual market transaction data. DAT Solutions is based in Beaverton, OR, with offices in Colorado, Missouri, Texas, and Bangalore, India.', 'Backend Software Engineer', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience with object-oriented/functional programming languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc.', 'A degree in Computer Science Statistics, Engineering, Information Systems, or another quantitative field.', 'In this role, you will work with our team of product managers, UX designers, data scientists, and data engineering experts using cutting edge tools to develop products that are reliable, scalable, and sustainable. You’ll be working with the data from our industry dominant network of brokers and carriers to bring actionable insights to our customers.', 'DAT Solutions is looking for a Backend Software Engineer to join our team in Denver, CO.', 'DAT Solutions embraces the value of a diverse workforce, and believes it is a core strength of our company that we encourage those values in every DAT employee, at every level of our organization, regardless of tenure or rank. We provide equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state, and local laws.', 'Work across the stack from raw data to customer-facing APIs', 'The Skills You’ll Need', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', 'Working knowledge of SQL and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL), as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.', 'Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and AWS regions.', 'As an experienced Backend Software Engineer you will be responsible for designing and building compelling, web-scale data delivery systems, supporting consumer-facing data visualization products.', 'All referrals and résumés are managed exclusively through the Human Resources Department.', 'About DAT', 'Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into innovative industry leaders.', '2+ years’ experience in a software development role, preferably in a web-scale, consumer facing product role (as opposed to internal users). In this role you will work the full stack, however this particular role will lean more towards backend / middleware.', 'Review functional requirements and analyze their impact on schedule and software ['', 'The complex chronic care group within clinical analytics employs cutting-edge ML, signal analysis, and time-series modeling to move the needle on healthcare using claims, commercial pharmacy, and front- end store data. As a lead data scientist supporting a portfolio of chronic disease-oriented internal products, you have strong client-service oriented skills but are a research and development champion.', 'MSc with significant experience.MD and/or PhD in a technical field or equivalent practical experience (e.g., PhD in machine learning, computer science, or statistics and modeling heavy engineering field (chemistry and bioengineering)).', 'Intelletec has partnered with a leading healthcare provider who is transforming health care through innovations that make quality care more accessible, easier to use, less expensive, and patient-focused. Our client’s mission is to improve health. Due to rapid growth, our client is hiring multiple ML Data Scientists.\xa0', 'Have 3 or more years of technical data science leadership, focusing on the application of ML to large datasets for healthcare or similar applications.Have strong (~2 years) consultatory, clinical and commercial stakeholder management, and leadership skills.Have experience (~2 years) leading a team of 2-4 data scientists and are comfortable leading a ‘squad’ of data scientists working across multiple disease areas.Are passionate about helping patients by integrating data science research into application.Are an expert in python and/or R, git, bash, and hive/SQL.', 'Skills:', 'MD and/or PhD in a technical field or equivalent practical experience (e.g., PhD in machine learning, computer science, or statistics and modeling heavy engineering field (chemistry and bioengineering)).', 'Are an expert in python and/or R, git, bash, and hive/SQL.', 'The role:', 'You’ll be joining a team of MDs, PhDs, MBAs, and MSc from top tier universities and industries that bring their clinical, technical, and economic experience to bear on some of the toughest targets in healthcare – chronic disease.The complex chronic care group within clinical analytics employs cutting-edge ML, signal analysis, and time-series modeling to move the needle on healthcare using claims, commercial pharmacy, and front- end store data. As a lead data scientist supporting a portfolio of chronic disease-oriented internal products, you have strong client-service oriented skills but are a research and development champion.', 'Have strong (~2 years) consultatory, clinical and commercial stakeholder management, and leadership skills.', 'You’ll be joining a team of MDs, PhDs, MBAs, and MSc from top tier universities and industries that bring their clinical, technical, and economic experience to bear on some of the toughest targets in healthcare – chronic disease.', 'Have experience (~2 years) leading a team of 2-4 data scientists and are comfortable leading a ‘squad’ of data scientists working across multiple disease areas.', 'Have 3 or more years of technical data science leadership, focusing on the application of ML to large datasets for healthcare or similar applications.', 'MSc with significant experience.', 'Are passionate about helping patients by integrating data science research into application.', 'Education:']

job_text: ['', 'About IBM', 'Must have basic knowledge in one of the following technology areas: Java, Javascript, C, C++, or Python', 'Work you could do as an Associate Full Stack Developer:', 'Must be currently participating in IBM Apprenticeship Program.', 'About Business Unit', 'Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise', 'None', 'Job Role Description', 'Must be currently participating in IBM Apprenticeship Program.Must have basic knowledge in one of the following technology areas: Java, Javascript, C, C++, or Python', 'Overview']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent oral and writing skills', 'We are an award-winning enthusiastic team, passionate about innovative, data-driven approaches to bring the right therapeutics for the right patients, and ultimately save millions of lives.', 'ReviveMed is an MIT spinout, artificial intelligence (AI)-driven drug discovery platform by uniquely leveraging data form small molecules or metabolites in the human body. Located in the heart of biotech innovation in Cambridge, ReviveMed uniquely overcomes the difficulties of identifying a large set of metabolites for each patient, based on technology that our team developed at MIT and published in Nature Methods. Our AI platform further combines the data from small molecules with other molecular data, and translates these data into novel therapeutic insights for drug discovery. Currently, ReviveMed is collaborating with tier-one pharmaceutical companies and pursuing internal drug discovery, initially focused on metabolic diseases, including non-alcoholic fatty liver.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share options.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. in systems biology, computational biology, biological engineering, biomedical engineering, bioinformatics or related fields.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical skills, experience with Python and R', '\xa0', 'We are looking for an exceptional deep learning data scientist to join our exceptional team. We have a fast-paced, high-performance, and result-oriented culture, looking for candidates hungry for learning. The preferred candidate will bring relevant experience, entrepreneurial drive, and a passion for advancing our vision.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Involvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clients.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extensive experience analyzing “-omic” data, specifically metabolomic data', 'Why you should join ReviveMed', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An opportunity to become part of a transformational approach to drug discovery and development from the beginning.', 'Preferred Qualifications', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Self-motivated, highly disciplined, and passionate about bringing the right therapeutics to the right patients', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Making an impact on the world with every line of code.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Opportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expands.', 'The Role']

Please read this Public Notice in its entirety prior to submitting your application for consideration.', "  Condition of Employment:  Travel includes scientific conferences, and up to 1 month at sea per year for research cruises.NoteThis Job Opportunity Announcement may be used to fill other Physical Scientist, ZP-1301-3/4 positions throughout NOAA. The position must be alike (e.g. within the same geographic locations, same grade/band and requires the same qualifications and specialized experience as indicated in this vacancy announcement).Applicants must meet ALL application requirements, to include a complete online resume, by 11:59 p.m. EASTERN TIME (ET) on the closing date of this announcement.QualificationsQualification requirements in the vacancy announcements are based on the U.S. Office of Personnel Management (OPM) Qualification Standards Handbook, which contains federal qualification standards. This handbook is available on the Office of Personnel Management's website located at: . BASIC REQUIREMENTS: This position has a positive Education Requirement in addition to at least one year of Specialized Experience in order to be found minimally qualified. Transcripts must be submitted with your application package. You MUST meet the following requirements:Education To qualify for the 1301 series:  Degree:  physical science, engineering, or mathematics that included 24 semester hours in physical science and/or related engineering science such as mechanics, dynamics, properties of materials, and electronics.OR  Combination of education an experience  -- education equivalent to one of the majors shown in A above that included at least 24 semester hours in physical science and/or related engineering science, plus appropriate experience or additional education.AND SPECIALIZED EXPERIENCE:  Applicants must possess one year of specialized experience equivalent in difficulty and responsibility to the next lower grade level in the Federal Service. Specialized experience is experience that has equipped the applicant with the particular competencies/knowledge, skills and abilities to successfully perform the duties of the position. This experience need not have been in the federal government.Experience refers to paid and unpaid experience, including volunteer work done through National Service programs (e.g., Peace Corps, AmeriCorps) and other organizations (e.g., professional; philanthropic; religious; spiritual; community, student, social). Volunteer work helps build critical competencies, knowledge, and skills and can provide valuable training and experience that translates directly to paid employment. You will receive credit for all qualifying experience, including volunteer experience.To Qualify At The ZP-3 Or GS-11 Level SPECIALIZED EXPERIENCE:  In addition to the basic requirements, applicants must possess one full year (52 weeks) of specialized experience equivalent to the ZP-2 or GS-09 in the Federal service. Specialized experience MUST include all of the following: Assisting with the collection, processing, and quality control of the analysis of oceanographic data, in order to ensure accurate data submission to scientific data centers;  Publishing technical oceanographic research reports or papers in the peer-reviewed literature as co-author;  Using mathematical and advanced technology to analyze, evaluate, and interpret scientific data; and  Participating in oceanographic field research cruises.OR SUBSTITUTION OF EDUCATION:  3 years of progressively higher level graduate education leading to a Ph.D. degree or Ph.D. or equivalent doctoral degree.OR COMBINATION OF EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:  A combination of education and experience.  Note: Only graduate education in excess of two years is qualifying for combination.To Qualify At The ZP-4 Or GS-13 Level SPECIALIZED EXPERIENCE:  In addition to the basic requirements, applicants must possess one full year (52 weeks) of specialized experience equivalent to the ZP-3 or GS-12 in the Federal service. Specialized experience MUST include all of the following: Collecting, assessing, analyzing, and integrating professional or scientific data;  Using mathematical and advanced technology to analyze, evaluate, and interpret scientific data;  Publishing technical oceanographic research reports or papers in the peer-reviewed literature as lead author; and  Participating in oceanographic field research cruises, including as Party Chief or Chief Scientist. Education College Transcript: If you are qualifying based on education, submit a copy of your college transcript that lists college courses detailing each course by the number and department (i.e., bio 101, math 210, etc.), course title, number of credit hours and grade earned. You must submit evidence that any education completed in a foreign institution is equivalent to U.S. education standards with your resume. You may submit an unofficial copy of the transcript at the initial phase of the application process. If course content cannot be easily identified from the title of the course as listed on your transcript, you must submit an official course description from the college/university that reflects the content at the time the course was taken. Note: Your college transcript is used to verify successful completion of degree, or college course work. An official college transcript will be required before you can report to duty.Required Documents  Resume showing relevant experience; cover letter optional . Your resume must indicate your citizenship and if you are registered for Selective Service if you are a male born after 12/31/59. Your resume must include information about your paid and nonpaid work experience related to this position including: job title, duration of employment (mm/dd/yy – mm/dd/yy), hours per week, duties and accomplishments, salary, and your education. Specialized experience is experience that has equipped the applicant with the particular competencies/knowledge, skills and abilities to successfully perform the duties of the position. This experience need not have been in the federal government.Experience refers to paid and unpaid experience, including volunteer work done through National Service programs (e.g., Peace Corps, AmeriCorps) and other organizations (e.g., professional; philanthropic; religious; spiritual; community, student, social). Volunteer work helps build critical competencies, knowledge, and skills and can provide valuable training and experience that translates directly to paid employment. You will receive credit for all qualifying experience, including volunteer experience.To Qualify At The ZP-3 Or GS-11 Level SPECIALIZED EXPERIENCE:  In addition to the basic requirements, applicants must possess one full year (52 weeks) of specialized experience equivalent to the ZP-2 or GS-09 in the Federal service. Specialized experience MUST include all of the following: Assisting with the collection, processing, and quality control of the analysis of oceanographic data, in order to ensure accurate data submission to scientific data centers;  Publishing technical oceanographic research reports or papers in the peer-reviewed literature as co-author;  Using mathematical and advanced technology to analyze, evaluate, and interpret scientific data; and  Participating in oceanographic field research cruises.OR SUBSTITUTION OF EDUCATION:  3 years of progressively higher level graduate education leading to a Ph.D. degree or Ph.D. or equivalent doctoral degree.OR COMBINATION OF EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE:  A combination of education and experience. Specialized experience MUST include all of the following: Collecting, assessing, analyzing, and integrating professional or scientific data;  Using mathematical and advanced technology to analyze, evaluate, and interpret scientific data;  Publishing technical oceanographic research reports or papers in the peer-reviewed literature as lead author; and  Participating in oceanographic field research cruises, including as Party Chief or Chief Scientist. Education College Transcript: If you are qualifying based on education, submit a copy of your college transcript that lists college courses detailing each course by the number and department (i.e., bio 101, math 210, etc.), course title, number of credit hours and grade earned. ['Job Summary', 'Necessary Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities', 'Examples of problems typically experienced are:\xa0o Equipment changes/modificationso Equipment malfunction/breakageo Process control system disruptionso MES (SAP) system disruptionso If the Scientist experiences a production problem, they are expected to troubleshoot and call on additional resources (experienced operator, process engineers, maintenance, quality specialist) as needed to resolve issues.\xa0\xa0', '• ', ' ', 'Supervisor Responsibilities (if applicable)', '\xa0', 'Primary Responsibilities', '.', 'Examples of problems typically experienced are:\xa0o ', 'Primary Responsibilities• Primary responsibility is to coordinate the development, clinical, manufacturing, product transfer, and scale-up batches of new products and processes in Wilson, NC as well as at third-party partner sites.\xa0 This includes such tasks as batch record preparation, protocol generation, scheduling, raw material acquisition, and travel for on-site supervision of batch manufacture.• Responsible for identifying potential product/process improvements of existing commercial dosage forms. Will present proposals to optimize formula and product flow.\xa0 Will implement changes after management approval.• Responsible for development of potential product/process activities for new products. Will present proposals to optimize formula and product flow.\xa0\xa0• Will provide technical assistance to alternate departments, as needed, to solve problems as they occur with the product.\xa0 This responsibility includes both troubleshooting of active products on the shop floor and potential rework procedures for failed batches.• Responsible for new equipment evaluation.\xa0 Additionally, will interface with engineering and equipment manufacturer to ensure proper installation and operation of the new equipment.\xa0 Will be responsible for coordination of all activities to transfer new equipment to production, including training as required of both supervisors and operators.• Responsible for new product evaluation.\xa0 Additionally, will interface with clinical, regulatory, R&D, operations and quality to ensure proper development of new products.\xa0 Will be responsible for coordination of all activities within pilot plant /operations and laboratory areas.\xa0\xa0• Responsible for evaluating and qualifying sources of raw materials.• Responsible for compliance with Controlled Substance documentation and accountability procedures while maintaining high alert to diversion and theft possibilities.• Coordinate, develop and prepare protocols for process / product development, validation studies, including cleaning and equipment validation.• Prepare reports, including data analysis, conclusions and recommendations.• Coordinate the execution of validation studies with Production Scheduling.\xa0 This may also include review and execution of protocols developed by other individuals.• Has a functional understanding of the operation of production equipment involved in the manufacturing process (such as high shear granulators, fluid bed processors, solution prep systems, weighing systems, milling systems, blending systems, tablet compression machines/encapsulators, etc.) following all applicable SOP’s, safety standards and procedures', 'Job SummaryThe Pharmaceutical Technology Scientist is primarily responsible for new product development, clinical activities, scale-up / manufacturing development, product transfer, optimization, and validation of new products/ processes into operations.\xa0 The major objective is to assure successful new products to production and proper training of production personnel in any new product, process and/or equipment.\xa0 Key objectives include clinical / manufacturing support, transfer of new products to the North Carolina as well as our external third-party partner sites and alternative API qualification. Additional responsibilities include troubleshooting and reformulation of problem products, product lifecycle development, product portfolio enhancement, and providing technical expertise and support to Production Investigations.\xa0 Other key objectives include generation, execution, and reporting of development, DOE’s, product, cleaning, and equipment validation protocols, new production / equipment selection and evaluation, rework evaluation of rejected batches and new/existing raw material evaluation.', 'Supervisor Responsibilities (if applicable)• The Pharm Tech Scientist reports administratively to the Senior Manager or Assistant Director, Pharmaceutical Technology.• The Pharm Tech Scientist, from time to time, be responsible for supervision of production supervisors, production operators, and other personnel in completion of the required batch manufacture functions.\xa0\xa0• The individual will, at times, perform some duties of the department manager, as required, in his/her absence.', 'Necessary Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities• In-depth knowledge of process development techniques, formulation, cGMP regulations, FDA and DEA regulations, and recent trends in validation concepts.\xa0\xa0• The individual must have a functional, working knowledge of pharmaceutical manufacturing equipment, and be able to supervise batch manufacture and instruct production operators.\xa0\xa0• A thorough knowledge of Pharmaceutical unit operations is required, primarily as it relates to solid dosage forms. Scientist is capable of competent scientific judgments.\xa0 Decisions must be made by this individual without delay during development, DOE, and batch manufacture.\xa0 This may require some innovation on very short notice.\xa0 “Thinking on your feet” is often required.• Original solutions will be required to optimize formulas/processes.• Coordination of scale-up is a complex process that differs with each individual product.\xa0 It is critical that problems be eliminated at this stage to obtain “right first time” commercial products• The development of protocols requires an understanding of the formula/process/system to be studied.\xa0 An approach must then be chosen which will demonstrate that the product performs in a consistent and acceptable manner.\xa0 This involves original thinking and independent research, as well as the ability to effectively interact with other departments and utilize available resources.\xa0 Effective time management is also essential.• The preparation of reports involves the analysis and evaluation of data regarding specifications and acceptance criteria and the presentation of all information in conformance with cGMPs, FDA guidelines/regulations, clinical and current validation industry practices.\xa0 All process variations, deviations or discrepancies must be investigated and fully explained and justified.• Periodically, the Scientist may encounter unexpected production problems as well as process deviations during the execution of studies. ']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of common modes of nuclear detection, particularly scintillation, proportional counting, and multi-channel analysis.', 'Education: Must have a PhD in nuclear, fusion or condensed matter physics with at least 3 years of postdoctoral experimental experience or industry experience as principle scientist, preferably AMO, vacuum science, or other fields utilizing single-particle detection methods and spectroscopy.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with unit and integration testing schemes, version control (Git), and modern front-end web technologies like React, Angular, Vue, JQuery, and RxJs.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must have demonstrated professional experience in analytic technical writing.', '\ufeffIn the performance of their respective tasks and duties all employees are expected to conform to the following:', 'Description:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expert in probability, statistics, and analysis; to include classical statistics and hypothesis testing, Bayesian methods, ANOVA, regression analysis, Fourier and wavelet analysis, time-series analysis, and generalized linear models.', 'Location: Tyson’s Corner/Falls Church, VA', 'Clearance: ', 'Looking for a highly resourceful and motivated candidate who is hands-on in three areas: low energy nuclear physics, data scientist, and development SME on program in providing services to DHS/CBP.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of modes of nuclear decay and spectral signatures of each type.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of nuclear technology, including reactors and threats.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of X-ray (MeV energy) imaging of large objects is plus.', 'Location: ', '\ufeff', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Liaises with external government entities (client and support organizations). Invents and implements methods and algorithms for threat determination and failure analysis.', 'Candidate also:', 'Qualifications:', 'Clearance: U.S. Citizens Only who have resided in the US for the past 5 years. Must be able to obtain a CBP SSBI clearance with DHS.', 'The candidate will serve as project(s) leader and mentor to assigned scientists and developers, determines project scope, timelines, and implementation details.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep knowledge of data structures and algorithms, operating systems, and low-level computer science.', 'Education: ', 'The candidate will have experience working on and managing small projects in a research group, hands on with building equipment and software, electronics, and mechanical design.', ' ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficiency with database querying in SQL, including knowledge of indexing/partitioning and paging methods, aggregation, and performance tuning. Familiarity with Data Access Object pattern and object-relational mappers such as SQLAlchemy, Django, Hibernate, or Entity Framework.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of Keras/TensorFlow or Torch greatly preferred.', '1.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform quality work within deadlines with or without direct supervision.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mastery of Python, including software design, implementation in built in classes and data structures.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent oral communicator with significant public speaking experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of common machine learning techniques (random forests, support vector machines, neural networks, Markov models) and associated numerical techniques (gradient descent, backpropagation, sampling, Markov Chain Monte Carlo, regularization techniques).', '3.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments.', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Interact professionally with other employees, customers and suppliers.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Gives input on staffing levels and allocation.', 'Corporate Performance Standards: ', '4.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mastery of systems level, object-oriented languages, including at least one of C++, C#, or Java.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Writes and reviews code to accomplish mission goals.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with common scientific toolsets using Pandas/NumPy/SciPy/Sci-Kit Learn and Jupyter.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must be able to develop a clear vision of projects and move quickly to build proof of concept.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Reviews changes requests and proposals; strategizes future operations.']

models that power our fraud detection engine. Our machine learning pipeline keeps us one step ahead of fraudsters and their constantly evolving tactics and our research and experiments develop into new products that improve the merchant payments experience.We expect our data scientists to be hands-on. ['', 'Communicates findings of surveillance activities and safety assessments to product teams and leadership to inform on necessary risk minimization activities, including label changes.', 'Degree in a Health Sciences (e.g., Pharmacy, Epidemiology, Nursing); o Bachelors + 2 years clinical/pharma or safety work experience o Masters or doctorate, 1-2 years clinical/pharma or safety work experience (e.g. MPH, PharmD, PhD, or Masters in a Health Science)', 'Qualifications', 'Proficient in pharmacovigilance regulations, guidelines, and company standard operating procedures', ' Responsible for standard surveillance activities for a product’s life cycle (one or more assigned compounds and products) through review of safety data from clinical trials, safety databases, and the literature. Collaborates with safety and clinical teams to develop strategies and approaches for signal assessments and regulatory requests by analyzing data from multiple sources. Analyzes data to support signal assessment and contributes to ad hoc regulatory safety requests using data from multiple sources with supervision. Utilizes medical judgment to determine the impact of identified safety issues on the compound/ product’s benefit-risk profile.
